89static const activity_id ACT_FIRSTAID( "ACT_FIRSTAID" );
90static const activity_id ACT_MAKE_ZLAVE( "ACT_MAKE_ZLAVE" );
91static const activity_id ACT_RELOAD( "ACT_RELOAD" );
92static const activity_id ACT_REPAIR_ITEM( "ACT_REPAIR_ITEM" );
93static const activity_id ACT_SPELLCASTING( "ACT_SPELLCASTING" );
94static const activity_id ACT_STUDY_SPELL( "ACT_STUDY_SPELL" );
95static const activity_id ACT_START_FIRE( "ACT_START_FIRE" );

97static const efftype_id effect_accumulated_mutagen( "accumulated_mutagen" );
98static const efftype_id effect_asthma( "asthma" );
99static const efftype_id effect_bandaged( "bandaged" );
100static const efftype_id effect_bite( "bite" );
101static const efftype_id effect_bleed( "bleed" );

146static const std::string flag_OVERSIZE( "OVERSIZE" );
147static const std::string flag_UNDERSIZE( "UNDERSIZE" );
148static const std::string flag_VARSIZE( "VARSIZE" );

151class npc;
152
153std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> iuse_transform::clone() const
154{
155 return std::make_unique<iuse_transform>( *this );
156}
157
158void iuse_transform::load( const JsonObject &obj )
159{
160 obj.read( "target", target, true );
161
162 obj.read( "msg", msg_transform );
163 obj.read( "container", container );
164 if( obj.has_member( "target_charges" ) && obj.has_member( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
165 obj.throw_error( "Transform actor specified both fixed and random target charges",
166 "target_charges" );
167 }
168 obj.read( "target_charges", ammo_qty );
169 if( obj.has_array( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
170 for( const int charge : obj.get_array( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
171 random_ammo_qty.push_back( charge );
172 }
173 if( random_ammo_qty.size() < 2 ) {
174 obj.throw_error( "You must specify two or more values to choose between", "rand_target_charges" );
175 }
176 }
177 obj.read( "target_ammo", ammo_type );
178
179 obj.read( "countdown", countdown );
180
181 if( !ammo_type.is_empty() && !container.is_empty() ) {
182 obj.throw_error( "Transform actor specified both ammo type and container type", "target_ammo" );
183 }
184
185 obj.read( "active", active );
186
187 obj.read( "moves", moves );
188 if( moves < 0 ) {
189 obj.throw_error( "transform actor specified negative moves", "moves" );
190 }
191
192 obj.read( "need_fire", need_fire );
193 need_fire = std::max( need_fire, 0 );
194 if( !obj.read( "need_charges_msg", need_charges_msg ) ) {
195 need_charges_msg = to_translation( "The %s is empty!" );
196 }
197
198 obj.read( "need_charges", need_charges );
199 need_charges = std::max( need_charges, 0 );
200 if( !obj.read( "need_fire_msg", need_fire_msg ) ) {
201 need_fire_msg = to_translation( "You need a source of fire!" );
202 }
203
204 obj.read( "need_worn", need_worn );
205 obj.read( "need_wielding", need_wielding );
206
207 obj.read( "qualities_needed", qualities_needed );
208
209 obj.read( "menu_text", menu_text );
210}
211
212int iuse_transform::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
213{
214 if( t ) {
215 return 0; // invoked from active item processing, do nothing.
216 }
217
218 const bool possess = p.has_item( it ) ||
219 ( it.has_flag( "ALLOWS_REMOTE_USE" ) && square_dist( p.pos(), pos ) == 1 );
220
221 if( possess && need_worn && !p.is_worn( it ) ) {
222 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
223 return 0;
224 }
225 if( possess && need_wielding && !p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
226 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
227 return 0;
228 }
229 if( need_charges ) {
230 if( it.has_flag( flag_POWERARMOR_MOD ) && p.can_interface_armor() ) {
231 if( !p.has_power() ) {
232 if( possess ) {
233 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_charges_msg, it.tname() );
234 }
235 return 0;
236 }
237 } else if( it.units_remaining( p ) < need_charges ) {
238 if( possess ) {
239 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_charges_msg, it.tname() );
240 }
241 return 0;
242 }
243 }
244
245
246 if( need_fire && possess ) {
247 if( !p.use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, need_fire ) ) {
248 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_fire_msg, it.tname() );
249 return 0;
250 }
251 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
252 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater" ) );
253 return 0;
254 }
255 }
256
257 if( possess && !msg_transform.empty() ) {
258 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, msg_transform, it.tname() );
259 }
260
261 if( possess ) {
262 p.moves -= moves;
263 }
264
265 item obj_copy( it );
266 item *obj;
267 // defined here to allow making a new item assigned to the pointer
268 item obj_it;
269 if( container.is_empty() ) {
270 obj = &it.convert( target );
271 if( ammo_qty >= 0 || !random_ammo_qty.empty() ) {
272 int qty;
273 if( !random_ammo_qty.empty() ) {
274 const auto index = rng( 1, random_ammo_qty.size() - 1 );
275 qty = rng( random_ammo_qty[index - 1], random_ammo_qty[index] );
276 } else {
277 qty = ammo_qty;
278 }
279 if( !ammo_type.is_empty() ) {
280 obj->ammo_set( ammo_type, qty );
281 } else if( !obj->ammo_current().is_null() ) {
282 obj->ammo_set( obj->ammo_current(), qty );
283 } else {
284 obj->set_countdown( qty );
285 }
286 }
287 } else {
288 it.convert( container );
289 obj_it = item( target, calendar::turn, std::max( ammo_qty, 1 ) );
290 obj = &obj_it;
291 it.put_in( *obj );
292 }
293 if( p.is_worn( *obj ) ) {
294 p.reset_encumbrance();
295 // This is most likely wrong: it doubles temperature shift for the turn!
296 p.update_bodytemp( get_map(), get_weather() );
297 p.on_worn_item_transform( obj_copy, *obj );
298 }
299 obj->item_counter = countdown > 0 ? countdown : obj->type->countdown_interval;
300 obj->active = active || obj->item_counter;
301
302 return 0;
303}
304
305ret_val<bool> iuse_transform::can_use( const Character &p, const item &, bool,
306 const tripoint & ) const
307{
308 if( qualities_needed.empty() ) {
309 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
310 }
311
312 std::map<quality_id, int> unmet_reqs;
313 inventory inv;
314 inv.form_from_map( p.pos(), 1, &p, true, true );
315 for( const auto &quality : qualities_needed ) {
316 if( !p.has_quality( quality.first, quality.second ) &&
317 !inv.has_quality( quality.first, quality.second ) ) {
318 unmet_reqs.insert( quality );
319 }
320 }
321 if( unmet_reqs.empty() ) {
322 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
323 }
324 std::string unmet_reqs_string = enumerate_as_string( unmet_reqs.begin(), unmet_reqs.end(),
325 [&]( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &unmet_req ) {
326 return string_format( "%s %d", unmet_req.first.obj().name, unmet_req.second );
327 } );
328 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( vgettext( "You need a tool with %s.", "You need tools with %s.",
329 unmet_reqs.size() ), unmet_reqs_string );
330}
331
332std::string iuse_transform::get_name() const
333{
334 if( !menu_text.empty() ) {
335 return menu_text.translated();
336 }
337 return iuse_actor::get_name();
338}
339
340void iuse_transform::finalize( const itype_id & )
341{
342 if( !target.is_valid() ) {
343 debugmsg( "Invalid transform target: %s", target.c_str() );
344 }
345
346 if( !container.is_empty() ) {
347 if( !container.is_valid() ) {
348 debugmsg( "Invalid transform container: %s", container.c_str() );
349 }
350
351 item dummy( target );
352 if( ammo_qty > 1 && !dummy.count_by_charges() ) {
353 debugmsg( "Transform target with container must be an item with charges, got non-charged: %s",
354 target.c_str() );
355 }
356 }
357}
358
359void iuse_transform::info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
360{
361 item dummy( target, calendar::turn, std::max( ammo_qty, 1 ) );
362 if( it.has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
363 dummy.set_flag( "FIT" );
364 }
365 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", string_format( _( "<bold>Turns into</bold>: %s" ),
366 dummy.tname() ) );
367 if( countdown > 0 ) {
368 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Countdown: " ), countdown );
369 }
370
371 const auto *explosion_use = dummy.get_use( "explosion" );
372 if( explosion_use != nullptr ) {
373 explosion_use->get_actor_ptr()->info( it, dump );
374 }
375}
376
377std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> unpack_actor::clone() const
378{
379 return std::make_unique<unpack_actor>( *this );
380}
381
382void unpack_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
383{
384 obj.read( "group", unpack_group );
385 obj.read( "items_fit", items_fit );
386 assign( obj, "filthy_volume_threshold", filthy_vol_threshold );
387}
388
389int unpack_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
390{
391 std::vector<item> items = item_group::items_from( unpack_group, calendar::turn );
392 item last_armor;
393
394 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You unpack the %s." ), it.tname() );
395
396 map &here = get_map();
397 for( item &content : items ) {
398 if( content.is_armor() ) {
399 if( items_fit ) {
400 content.set_flag( "FIT" );
401 } else if( content.typeId() == last_armor.typeId() ) {
402 if( last_armor.has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
403 content.set_flag( "FIT" );
404 } else if( !last_armor.has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
405 content.unset_flag( "FIT" );
406 }
407 }
408 last_armor = content;
409 }
410
411 if( content.get_storage() >= filthy_vol_threshold && it.has_flag( "FILTHY" ) ) {
412 content.set_flag( "FILTHY" );
413 }
414
415 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), content );
416 }
417
418 p.i_rem( &it );
419
420 return 0;
421}
422
423void unpack_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
424{
425 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
426 _( "This item could be unpacked to receive something." ) );
427}
428
429std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> countdown_actor::clone() const
430{
431 return std::make_unique<countdown_actor>( *this );
432}
433
434void countdown_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
435{
436 obj.read( "name", name );
437 obj.read( "interval", interval );
438 obj.read( "message", message );
439}
440
441int countdown_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
442{
443 if( t ) {
444 return 0;
445 }
446
447 if( it.active ) {
448 return 0;
449 }
450
451 if( p.sees( pos ) && !message.empty() ) {
452 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( message ), it.tname() );
453 }
454
455 it.item_counter = interval > 0 ? interval : it.type->countdown_interval;
456 it.active = true;
457 return 0;
458}
459
460ret_val<bool> countdown_actor::can_use( const Character &, const item &it, bool,
461 const tripoint & ) const
462{
463 if( it.active ) {
464 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "It's already been triggered." ) );
465 }
466
467 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
468}
469
470std::string countdown_actor::get_name() const
471{
472 if( !name.empty() ) {
473 return name;
474 }
475 return iuse_actor::get_name();
476}
477
478void countdown_actor::info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
479{
480 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Countdown: " ),
481 interval > 0 ? interval : it.type->countdown_interval );
482 const auto countdown_actor = it.type->countdown_action.get_actor_ptr();
483 if( countdown_actor != nullptr ) {
484 countdown_actor->info( it, dump );
485 }
486}
487
488std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> explosion_iuse::clone() const
489{
490 return std::make_unique<explosion_iuse>( *this );
491}
492
493// For an explosion (which releases some kind of gas), this function
494// calculates the points around that explosion where to create those
495// gas fields.
496// Those points must have a clear line of sight and a clear path to
497// the center of the explosion.
498// They must also be passable.
499static std::vector<tripoint> points_for_gas_cloud( const tripoint &center, int radius )
500{
501 map &here = get_map();
502 std::vector<tripoint> result;
503 for( const auto &p : closest_points_first( center, radius ) ) {
504 if( here.impassable( p ) ) {
505 continue;
506 }
507 if( p != center ) {
508 if( !here.clear_path( center, p, radius, 1, 100 ) ) {
509 // Can not splatter gas from center to that point, something is in the way
510 continue;
511 }
512 }
513 result.push_back( p );
514 }
515 return result;
516}
517
518void explosion_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
519{
520 if( obj.has_object( "explosion" ) ) {
521 auto expl = obj.get_object( "explosion" );
522 explosion = load_explosion_data( expl );
523 }
524
525 obj.read( "draw_explosion_radius", draw_explosion_radius );
526 if( obj.has_member( "draw_explosion_color" ) ) {
527 draw_explosion_color = color_from_string( obj.get_string( "draw_explosion_color" ) );
528 }
529 obj.read( "do_flashbang", do_flashbang );
530 obj.read( "flashbang_player_immune", flashbang_player_immune );
531 obj.read( "fields_radius", fields_radius );
532 if( obj.has_member( "fields_type" ) || fields_radius > 0 ) {
533 fields_type = field_type_id( obj.get_string( "fields_type" ) );
534 }
535 obj.read( "fields_min_intensity", fields_min_intensity );
536 obj.read( "fields_max_intensity", fields_max_intensity );
537 if( fields_max_intensity == 0 ) {
538 fields_max_intensity = fields_type.obj().get_max_intensity();
539 }
540 obj.read( "emp_blast_radius", emp_blast_radius );
541 obj.read( "scrambler_blast_radius", scrambler_blast_radius );
542 obj.read( "sound_volume", sound_volume );
543 obj.read( "sound_msg", sound_msg );
544 obj.read( "no_deactivate_msg", no_deactivate_msg );
545}
546
547int explosion_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
548{
549 if( t ) {
550 if( sound_volume >= 0 ) {
551 sounds::sound( pos, sound_volume, sounds::sound_t::alarm,
552 sound_msg.empty() ? _( "Tick." ) : _( sound_msg ), true, "misc", "bomb_ticking" );
553 }
554 return 0;
555 }
556 if( it.charges > 0 ) {
557 if( p.has_item( it ) ) {
558 if( no_deactivate_msg.empty() ) {
559 p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
560 _( "You've already set the %s's timer you might want to get away from it." ), it.tname() );
561 } else {
562 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( no_deactivate_msg ), it.tname() );
563 }
564 }
565 return 0;
566 }
567
568 trigger_explosion( pos );
569 return 1;
570}
571
572void explosion_iuse::trigger_explosion( const tripoint &pos ) const
573{
574 if( explosion ) {
575 explosion_handler::explosion( pos, explosion );
576 }
577
578 if( draw_explosion_radius >= 0 ) {
579 explosion_handler::draw_explosion( pos, draw_explosion_radius, draw_explosion_color, "explosion" );
580 }
581 if( do_flashbang ) {
582 explosion_handler::flashbang( pos, flashbang_player_immune, "explosion" );
583 }
584 map &here = get_map();
585 if( fields_radius >= 0 && fields_type.id() ) {
586 std::vector<tripoint> gas_sources = points_for_gas_cloud( pos, fields_radius );
587 for( auto &gas_source : gas_sources ) {
588 const int field_intensity = rng( fields_min_intensity, fields_max_intensity );
589 here.add_field( gas_source, fields_type, field_intensity, 1_turns );
590 }
591 }
592 if( scrambler_blast_radius >= 0 ) {
593 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, scrambler_blast_radius ) ) {
594 explosion_handler::scrambler_blast( dest );
595 }
596 }
597 if( emp_blast_radius >= 0 ) {
598 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, emp_blast_radius ) ) {
599 explosion_handler::emp_blast( dest );
600 }
601 }
602}
603
604void explosion_iuse::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
605{
606 if( explosion.damage > 0 ) {
607 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Blast damage at epicenter: " ),
608 explosion.damage );
609 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Blast radius: " ), static_cast<int>( explosion.radius ) );
610 }
611 const auto &sd = explosion.fragment;
612 if( sd ) {
613 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Shrapnel damage: " ),
614 static_cast<int>( sd->impact.total_damage() ) );
615 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Shrapnel range: " ), sd->range );
616 }
617
618 // TODO: List other effects, like EMP and clouds
619}
620
621std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> unfold_vehicle_iuse::clone() const
622{
623 return std::make_unique<unfold_vehicle_iuse>( *this );
624}
625
626void unfold_vehicle_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
627{
628 vehicle_id = vproto_id( obj.get_string( "vehicle_name" ) );
629 obj.read( "unfold_msg", unfold_msg );
630 obj.read( "moves", moves );
631 obj.read( "tools_needed", tools_needed );
632}
633
634int unfold_vehicle_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
635{
636 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
637 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
638 return 0;
639 }
640 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
641 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
642 return 0;
643 }
644 for( const auto &tool : tools_needed ) {
645 // Amount == -1 means need one, but don't consume it.
646 if( !p.has_amount( tool.first, 1 ) ) {
647 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %s to do it!" ),
648 item::nname( tool.first ) );
649 return 0;
650 }
651 }
652
653 vehicle *veh = get_map().add_vehicle( vehicle_id, p.pos(), 0_degrees, 0, 0, false );
654 if( veh == nullptr ) {
655 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no room to unfold the %s." ), it.tname() );
656 return 0;
657 }
658 veh->set_owner( p );
659
660 // Mark the vehicle as foldable.
661 veh->tags.insert( "convertible" );
662 // Store the id of the item the vehicle is made of.
663 veh->tags.insert( std::string( "convertible:" ) + it.typeId().str() );
664 if( !unfold_msg.empty() ) {
665 p.add_msg_if_player( _( unfold_msg ), it.tname() );
666 }
667 p.moves -= moves;
668 // Restore HP of parts if we stashed them previously.
669 if( it.has_var( "folding_bicycle_parts" ) ) {
670 // Brand new, no HP stored
671 return 1;
672 }
673 std::istringstream veh_data;
674 const auto data = it.get_var( "folding_bicycle_parts" );
675 veh_data.str( data );
676 if( !data.empty() && data[0] >= '0' && data[0] <= '9' ) {
677 // starts with a digit -> old format
678 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
679 int tmp;
680 veh_data >> tmp;
681 veh->set_hp( vpr.part(), tmp );
682 }
683 } else {
684 try {
685 JsonIn json( veh_data );
686 // Load parts into a temporary vector to not override
687 // cached values (like precalc, passenger_id, ...)
688 std::vector<vehicle_part> parts;
689 json.read( parts );
690 for( size_t i = 0; i < parts.size() && i < static_cast<size_t>( veh->part_count() ); i++ ) {
691 const vehicle_part &src = parts[i];
692 vehicle_part &dst = veh->part( i );
693 // and now only copy values, that are
694 // expected to be consistent.
695 veh->set_hp( dst, src.hp() );
696 dst.blood = src.blood;
697 // door state/amount of fuel/direction of headlight
698 dst.ammo_set( src.ammo_current(), src.ammo_remaining() );
699 dst.flags = src.flags;
700 }
701 } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
702 debugmsg( "Error restoring vehicle: %s", e.c_str() );
703 }
704 }
705 return 1;
706}
707
708std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> consume_drug_iuse::clone() const
709{
710 return std::make_unique<consume_drug_iuse>( *this );
711}
712
713static effect_data load_effect_data( const JsonObject &e )
714{
715 time_duration time;
716 if( e.has_string( "duration" ) ) {
717 time = read_from_json_string<time_duration>( *e.get_raw( "duration" ), time_duration::units );
718 } else {
719 time = time_duration::from_turns( e.get_int( "duration", 0 ) );
720 }
721 if( e.get_bool( "permanent", false ) ) {
722 effect_data ret( efftype_id( e.get_string( "id" ) ), time,
723 get_body_part_token( e.get_string( "bp", "NUM_BP" ) ) );
724 ret.permanent = true;
725 if( json_report_strict ) {
726 try {
727 e.throw_error( "Effect permanence has been moved to effect_type. Set permanence there.",
728 "permanent" );
729 } catch( const JsonError &ex ) {
730 debugmsg( "\n%s", ex.what() );
731 }
732 }
733 return ret;
734 } else {
735 return effect_data( efftype_id( e.get_string( "id" ) ), time,
736 get_body_part_token( e.get_string( "bp", "NUM_BP" ) ) );
737 }
738}
739
740void consume_drug_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
741{
742 obj.read( "activation_message", activation_message );
743 obj.read( "charges_needed", charges_needed );
744 obj.read( "tools_needed", tools_needed );
745
746 if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
747 for( const JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
748 effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
749 }
750 }
751 obj.read( "stat_adjustments", stat_adjustments );
752 obj.read( "fields_produced", fields_produced );
753 obj.read( "moves", moves );
754
755 for( JsonArray vit : obj.get_array( "vitamins" ) ) {
756 auto lo = vit.get_int( 1 );
757 auto hi = vit.size() >= 3 ? vit.get_int( 2 ) : lo;
758 vitamins.emplace( vitamin_id( vit.get_string( 0 ) ), std::make_pair( lo, hi ) );
759 }
760
761 used_up_item = obj.get_string( "used_up_item", used_up_item );
762
763}
764
765void consume_drug_iuse::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
766{
767 const std::string vits = enumerate_as_string( vitamins.begin(), vitamins.end(),
768 []( const decltype( vitamins )::value_type & v ) {
769 const time_duration rate = get_player_character().vitamin_rate( v.first );
770 if( rate <= 0_turns ) {
771 return std::string();
772 }
773 const int lo = static_cast<int>( v.second.first * rate / 1_days * 100 );
774 const int hi = static_cast<int>( v.second.second * rate / 1_days * 100 );
775
776 return string_format( lo == hi ? "%s (%i%%)" : "%s (%i-%i%%)", v.first.obj().name(), lo,
777 hi );
778 } );
779
780 if( !vits.empty() ) {
781 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Vitamins (RDA): " ), vits );
782 }
783
784 if( tools_needed.count( itype_syringe ) ) {
785 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "You need a <info>syringe</info> to inject this drug." ) );
786 }
787}
788
789int consume_drug_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
790{
791 auto need_these = tools_needed;
792 if( need_these.count( itype_syringe ) && p.has_bionic( bio_syringe ) ) {
793 need_these.erase( itype_syringe ); // no need for a syringe with bionics like these!
794 }
795 // Check prerequisites first.
796 for( const auto &tool : need_these ) {
797 // Amount == -1 means need one, but don't consume it.
798 if( !p.has_amount( tool.first, 1 ) ) {
799 p.add_msg_player_or_say( _( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
800 _( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
801 item::nname( tool.first ),
802 it.type_name( 1 ) );
803 return -1;
804 }
805 }
806 for( const auto &consumable : charges_needed ) {
807 // Amount == -1 means need one, but don't consume it.
808 if( !p.has_charges( consumable.first, ( consumable.second == -1 ) ?
809 1 : consumable.second ) ) {
810 p.add_msg_player_or_say( _( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
811 _( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
812 item::nname( consumable.first ),
813 it.type_name( 1 ) );
814 return -1;
815 }
816 }
817 // Apply the various effects.
818 for( const auto &eff : effects ) {
819 time_duration dur = eff.duration;
820 if( p.has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
821 dur *= .8;
822 } else if( p.has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
823 dur *= 1.2;
824 }
825 p.add_effect( eff.id, dur, eff.bp );
826 if( eff.permanent ) {
827 p.get_effect( eff.id, eff.bp ).set_permanent();
828 }
829 }
830 for( const auto &stat_adjustment : stat_adjustments ) {
831 p.mod_stat( stat_adjustment.first, stat_adjustment.second );
832 }
833 map &here = get_map();
834 for( const auto &field : fields_produced ) {
835 const field_type_id fid = field_type_id( field.first );
836 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
837 here.add_field( {p.posx() + static_cast<int>( rng( -2, 2 ) ), p.posy() + static_cast<int>( rng( -2, 2 ) ), p.posz()},
838 fid,
839 field.second );
840 }
841 }
842
843 // for vitamins that accumulate (max > 0) multivitamins risk causing hypervitaminosis
844 for( const auto &v : vitamins ) {
845 // players with mutations that remove the requirement for a vitamin cannot suffer accumulation of it
846 p.vitamin_mod( v.first, rng( v.second.first, v.second.second ),
847 p.vitamin_rate( v.first ) <= 0_turns );
848 }
849
850 // Output message.
851 p.add_msg_if_player( _( activation_message ), it.type_name( 1 ) );
852 // Consume charges.
853 for( const auto &consumable : charges_needed ) {
854 if( consumable.second != -1 ) {
855 p.use_charges( consumable.first, consumable.second );
856 }
857 }
858
859 if( !used_up_item.empty() ) {
860 item used_up( used_up_item, it.birthday() );
861 p.i_add_or_drop( used_up );
862 }
863
864 p.moves -= moves;
865 return it.type->charges_to_use();
866}
867
868std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> delayed_transform_iuse::clone() const
869{
870 return std::make_unique<delayed_transform_iuse>( *this );
871}
872
873void delayed_transform_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
874{
875 iuse_transform::load( obj );
876 not_ready_msg = obj.get_string( "not_ready_msg" );
877 transform_age = obj.get_int( "transform_age" );
878}
879
880int delayed_transform_iuse::time_to_do( const item &it ) const
881{
882 // TODO: change return type to time_duration
883 return transform_age - to_turns<int>( it.age() );
884}
885
886int delayed_transform_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
887{
888 if( time_to_do( it ) > 0 ) {
889 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( not_ready_msg ) );
890 return 0;
891 }
892 return iuse_transform::use( p, it, t, pos );
893}
894
895std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> set_transform_iuse::clone() const
896{
897 return std::make_unique<set_transform_iuse>( *this );
898}
899
900void set_transform_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
901{
902 iuse_transform::load( obj );
903 obj.read( "turn_off", turn_off );
904 obj.read( "flag", flag );
905 if( !obj.read( "set_charges_msg", set_charges_msg ) ) {
906 set_charges_msg = to_translation( "The %s is empty!" );
907 }
908
909 if( !obj.read( "set_charges", set_charges ) ) {
910 set_charges = 0;
911 }
912 set_charges = std::max( set_charges, 0 );
913}
914
915int set_transform_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
916{
917 if( t ) {
918 return 0; // invoked from active item processing, do nothing.
919 }
920
921 const bool possess = p.has_item( it ) ||
922 ( it.has_flag( "ALLOWS_REMOTE_USE" ) && square_dist( p.pos(), pos ) == 1 );
923
924 if( set_charges ) {
925 if( it.is_power_armor() && p.can_interface_armor() ) {
926 if( !p.has_power() ) {
927 if( possess ) {
928 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, set_charges_msg, it.tname() );
929 }
930 return 0;
931 }
932 } else if( it.units_remaining( p ) < set_charges ) {
933 if( possess ) {
934 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, set_charges_msg, it.tname() );
935 }
936 return 0;
937 }
938 }
939
940 iuse_transform::use( p, it, t, pos );
941
942 for( auto &elem : p.worn ) {
943 if( elem.has_flag( flag ) && elem.active == turn_off ) {
944 if( elem.type->can_use( "set_transformed" ) ) {
945 const set_transformed_iuse *actor = dynamic_cast<const set_transformed_iuse *>
946 ( elem.get_use( "set_transformed" )->get_actor_ptr() );
947 if( actor == nullptr ) {
948 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
949 } else {
950 actor->bypass( p, elem, t, pos );
951 }
952 } else {
953 debugmsg( "Expected set_transformed function" );
954 }
955 }
956 }
957 return 0;
958}
959
960std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> set_transformed_iuse::clone() const
961{
962 return std::make_unique<set_transformed_iuse>( *this );
963}
964
965void set_transformed_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
966{
967 iuse_transform::load( obj );
968 obj.read( "restricted", restricted );
969 obj.read( "dependencies", dependencies );
970}
971
972int set_transformed_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
973{
974 if( t ) {
975 return 0; // invoked from active item processing, do nothing.
976 }
977
978 iuse_transform::use( p, it, t, pos );
979
980 return 0;
981}
982
983int set_transformed_iuse::bypass( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
984{
985 return iuse_transform::use( p, it, t, pos );
986}
987
988ret_val<bool> set_transformed_iuse::can_use( const Character &, const item &, bool,
989 const tripoint & ) const
990{
991 if( restricted ) {
992 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Activate via main piece." ) );
993 }
994 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
995
996}
997
998std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_monster_iuse::clone() const
999{
1000 return std::make_unique<place_monster_iuse>( *this );
1001}
1002
1003void place_monster_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1004{
1005 mtypeid = mtype_id( obj.get_string( "monster_id" ) );
1006 obj.read( "friendly_msg", friendly_msg );
1007 obj.read( "hostile_msg", hostile_msg );
1008 obj.read( "difficulty", difficulty );
1009 obj.read( "moves", moves );
1010 obj.read( "place_randomly", place_randomly );
1011 obj.read( "is_pet", is_pet );
1012 if( obj.has_array( "skills" ) ) {
1013 JsonArray skills_ja = obj.get_array( "skills" );
1014 for( JsonValue s : skills_ja ) {
1015 skills.emplace( skill_id( s.get_string() ) );
1016 }
1017 }
1018}
1019
1020int place_monster_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
1021{
1022 shared_ptr_fast<monster> newmon_ptr = make_shared_fast<monster>( mtypeid );
1023 monster &newmon = *newmon_ptr;
1024 newmon.init_from_item( it );
1025 if( place_randomly ) {
1026 // place_critter_around returns the same pointer as its parameter (or null)
1027 if( !g->place_critter_around( newmon_ptr, p.pos(), 1 ) ) {
1028 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is no adjacent square to release the %s in!" ),
1029 newmon.name() );
1030 return 0;
1031 }
1032 } else {
1033 const std::string query = string_format( _( "Place the %s where?" ), newmon.name() );
1034 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( query );
1035 if( !pnt_ ) {
1036 return 0;
1037 }
1038 // place_critter_at returns the same pointer as its parameter (or null)
1039 if( !g->place_critter_at( newmon_ptr, *pnt_ ) ) {
1040 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot place a %s there." ), newmon.name() );
1041 return 0;
1042 }
1043 }
1044 p.moves -= moves;
1045 if( !newmon.has_flag( MF_INTERIOR_AMMO ) ) {
1046 for( auto &amdef : newmon.ammo ) {
1047 item ammo_item( amdef.first, calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
1048 const int available = p.charges_of( amdef.first );
1049 if( available == 0 ) {
1050 amdef.second = 0;
1051 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1052 _( "If you had standard factory-built %1$s bullets, you could load the %2$s." ),
1053 ammo_item.type_name( 2 ), newmon.name() );
1054 continue;
1055 }
1056 // Don't load more than the default from the monster definition.
1057 ammo_item.charges = std::min( available, amdef.second );
1058 p.use_charges( amdef.first, ammo_item.charges );
1059 //~ First %s is the ammo item (with plural form and count included), second is the monster name
1060 p.add_msg_if_player( vgettext( "You load %1$d x %2$s round into the %3$s.",
1061 "You load %1$d x %2$s rounds into the %3$s.", ammo_item.charges ),
1062 ammo_item.charges, ammo_item.type_name( ammo_item.charges ),
1063 newmon.name() );
1064 amdef.second = ammo_item.charges;
1065 }
1066 }
1067 int skill_offset = 0;
1068 for( const skill_id &sk : skills ) {
1069 skill_offset += p.get_skill_level( sk );
1070 }
1071 /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of a placed turret being friendly */
1072 if( rng( 0, p.int_cur ) + skill_offset < rng( 0, 2 * difficulty ) ) {
1073 if( hostile_msg.empty() ) {
1074 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The %s scans you and makes angry beeping noises!" ),
1075 newmon.name() );
1076 } else {
1077 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, "%s", _( hostile_msg ) );
1078 }
1079 } else {
1080 if( friendly_msg.empty() ) {
1081 p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The %s emits an IFF beep as it scans you." ),
1082 newmon.name() );
1083 } else {
1084 p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, "%s", _( friendly_msg ) );
1085 }
1086 newmon.friendly = -1;
1087 if( is_pet ) {
1088 newmon.add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, num_bp );
1089 }
1090 }
1091 // TODO: add a flag instead of monster id or something?
1092 if( newmon.type->id == mtype_id( "mon_laserturret" ) && !g->is_in_sunlight( newmon.pos() ) ) {
1093 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "A flashing LED on the laser turret appears to indicate low light." ) );
1094 }
1095 return 1;
1096}
1097
1098std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_npc_iuse::clone() const
1099{
1100 return std::make_unique<place_npc_iuse>( *this );
1101}
1102
1103void place_npc_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1104{
1105 npc_class_id = string_id<npc_template>( obj.get_string( "npc_class_id" ) );
1106 obj.read( "summon_msg", summon_msg );
1107 obj.read( "moves", moves );
1108 obj.read( "place_randomly", place_randomly );
1109}
1110
1111int place_npc_iuse::use( player &p, item &, bool, const tripoint & ) const
1112{
1113 map &here = get_map();
1114 cata::optional<tripoint> target_pos;
1115 if( place_randomly ) {
1116 const tripoint_range<tripoint> target_range = points_in_radius( p.pos(), 1 );
1117 target_pos = random_point( target_range, []( const tripoint & t ) {
1118 return !get_map().passable( t );
1119 } );
1120 } else {
1121 const std::string query = _( "Place npc where?" );
1122 target_pos = choose_adjacent( _( "Place npc where?" ) );
1123 }
1124 if( !target_pos ) {
1125 return 0;
1126 }
1127 if( !here.passable( target_pos.value() ) ) {
1128 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is no square to spawn npc in!" ) );
1129 return 0;
1130 }
1131
1132 here.place_npc( target_pos.value().xy(), npc_class_id );
1133 p.mod_moves( -moves );
1134 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, "%s", _( summon_msg ) );
1135 return 1;
1136}
1137
1138std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> pick_lock_actor::clone() const
1139{
1140 return std::make_unique<pick_lock_actor>( *this );
1141}
1142
1143void pick_lock_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1144{
1145 pick_quality = obj.get_int( "pick_quality" );
1146}
1147
1148int pick_lock_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
1149{
1150 if( p.is_npc() ) {
1151 return 0;
1152 }
1153
1154 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
1155 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
1156 return 0;
1157 }
1158
1159 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = []( const tripoint & pnt ) {
1160 if( pnt == g->u.pos() ) {
1161 return false;
1162 }
1163 const ter_id ter = g->m.ter( pnt );
1164 const furn_id furn = g->m.furn( pnt );
1165 lockpicking_open_result result = get_lockpicking_open_result( ter, furn );
1166 const bool is_allowed = result.new_ter_type || result.new_furn_type;
1167 return is_allowed;
1168 };
1169
1170 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
1171 _( "Use your lockpick where?" ), _( "There is nothing to lockpick nearby." ), f, false );
1172 if( !pnt_ ) {
1173 return 0;
1174 }
1175 const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
1176 const ter_id type = g->m.ter( pnt );
1177 if( !f( pnt ) ) {
1178 if( pnt == p.pos() ) {
1179 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You pick your nose and your sinuses swing open." ) );
1180 } else if( g->critter_at<npc>( pnt ) ) {
1181 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1182 _( "You can pick your friends, and you can\npick your nose, but you can't pick\nyour friend's nose." ) );
1183 } else if( type == t_door_c ) {
1184 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That door isn't locked." ) );
1185 } else {
1186 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That cannot be picked." ) );
1187 }
1188 return 0;
1189 }
1190
1191 /** @EFFECT_DEX speeds up door lock picking */
1192 /** @EFFECT_LOCKPICK speeds up door lock picking */
1193 const int duration = std::max( 0,
1194 to_moves<int>( 10_minutes - time_duration::from_minutes( it.get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK ) ) ) -
1195 ( p.dex_cur + 5 ) * 2300 );
1196
1197 p.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_LOCKPICK" ), duration, -1, p.get_item_position( &it ) );
1198 p.activity.targets.push_back( item_location( p, &it ) );
1199 p.activity.placement = pnt;
1200
1201 return it.type->charges_to_use();
1202}
1203
1204std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_furn_actor::clone() const
1205{
1206 return std::make_unique<deploy_furn_actor>( *this );
1207}
1208
1209void deploy_furn_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
1210{
1211 std::vector<std::string> can_function_as;
1212 const furn_t &the_furn = furn_type.obj();
1213 const std::string furn_name = the_furn.name();
1214
1215 if( the_furn.workbench ) {
1216 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a <info>crafting station</info>" ) );
1217 }
1218 if( the_furn.has_flag( "BUTCHER_EQ" ) ) {
1219 can_function_as.emplace_back(
1220 _( "a place to hang <info>corpses for butchering</info>" ) );
1221 }
1222 if( the_furn.has_flag( "FLAT_SURF" ) ) {
1223 can_function_as.emplace_back(
1224 _( "a flat surface to <info>butcher</info> onto or <info>eat meals</info> from" ) );
1225 }
1226 if( the_furn.has_flag( "CAN_SIT" ) ) {
1227 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>sit</info>" ) );
1228 }
1229 if( the_furn.has_flag( "HIDE_PLACE" ) ) {
1230 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>hide</info>" ) );
1231 }
1232 if( the_furn.has_flag( "FIRE_CONTAINER" ) ) {
1233 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a safe place to <info>contain a fire</info>" ) );
1234 }
1235 if( the_furn.crafting_pseudo_item == itype_char_smoker ) {
1236 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>smoke or dry food</info> for preservation" ) );
1237 }
1238
1239 if( can_function_as.empty() ) {
1240 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1241 string_format( _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>)." ),
1242 furn_name ) );
1243 } else {
1244 std::string furn_usages = enumerate_as_string( can_function_as, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
1245 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1246 string_format(
1247 _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>), which can then be used as %s." ),
1248 furn_name, furn_usages ) );
1249 }
1250}
1251
1252void deploy_furn_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1253{
1254 furn_type = furn_str_id( obj.get_string( "furn_type" ) );
1255}
1256
1257int deploy_furn_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint &pos ) const
1258{
1259 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
1260 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
1261 return 0;
1262 }
1263 tripoint pnt = pos;
1264 if( pos == p.pos() ) {
1265 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Deploy where?" ) ) ) {
1266 pnt = *pnt_;
1267 } else {
1268 return 0;
1269 }
1270 }
1271
1272 if( pnt == p.pos() ) {
1273 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1274 _( "You attempt to become one with the furniture. It doesn't work." ) );
1275 return 0;
1276 }
1277
1278 map &here = get_map();
1279 optional_vpart_position veh_there = here.veh_at( pnt );
1280 if( veh_there.has_value() ) {
1281 // TODO: check for protrusion+short furniture, wheels+tiny furniture, NOCOLLIDE flag, etc.
1282 // and/or integrate furniture deployment with construction (which already seems to perform these checks sometimes?)
1283 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The space under %s is too cramped to deploy a %s in." ),
1284 veh_there.value().vehicle().disp_name(), it.tname() );
1285 return 0;
1286 }
1287
1288 // For example: dirt = 2, long grass = 3
1289 if( here.move_cost( pnt ) != 2 && here.move_cost( pnt ) != 3 ) {
1290 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't deploy a %s there." ), it.tname() );
1291 return 0;
1292 }
1293
1294 if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
1295 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is already furniture at that location." ) );
1296 return 0;
1297 }
1298
1299 here.furn_set( pnt, furn_type );
1300 p.mod_moves( to_turns<int>( 2_seconds ) );
1301 return 1;
1302}
1303
1304std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> reveal_map_actor::clone() const
1305{
1306 return std::make_unique<reveal_map_actor>( *this );
1307}
1308
1309void reveal_map_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1310{
1311 radius = obj.get_int( "radius" );
1312 message = obj.get_string( "message" );
1313 std::string ter;
1314 ot_match_type ter_match_type;
1315 for( const JsonValue entry : obj.get_array( "terrain" ) ) {
1316 if( entry.test_string() ) {
1317 ter = entry.get_string();
1318 ter_match_type = ot_match_type::contains;
1319 } else {
1320 JsonObject jo = entry.get_object();
1321 ter = jo.get_string( "om_terrain" );
1322 ter_match_type = jo.get_enum_value<ot_match_type>( "om_terrain_match_type",
1323 ot_match_type::contains );
1324 }
1325 omt_types.push_back( std::make_pair( ter, ter_match_type ) );
1326 }
1327}
1328
1329void reveal_map_actor::reveal_targets( const tripoint_abs_omt &center,
1330 const std::pair<std::string, ot_match_type> &target,
1331 int reveal_distance ) const
1332{
1333 const auto places = overmap_buffer.find_all( center, target.first, radius, false,
1334 target.second );
1335 for( auto &place : places ) {
1336 overmap_buffer.reveal( place, reveal_distance );
1337 }
1338}
1339
1340int reveal_map_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
1341{
1342 if( it.already_used_by_player( p ) ) {
1343 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "There isn't anything new on the %s." ), it.tname() );
1344 return 0;
1345 } else if( g->get_levz() < 0 ) {
1346 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You should read your %s when you get to the surface." ),
1347 it.tname() );
1348 return 0;
1349 } else if( !character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( p ) ) {
1350 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "It's too dark to read." ) );
1351 return 0;
1352 }
1353 const tripoint_abs_omt center( it.get_var( "reveal_map_center_omt",
1354 p.global_omt_location().raw() ) );
1355 for( auto &omt : omt_types ) {
1356 for( int z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z++ ) {
1357 reveal_targets( tripoint_abs_omt( center.xy(), z ), omt, 0 );
1358 }
1359 }
1360 if( !message.empty() ) {
1361 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, "%s", _( message ) );
1362 }
1363 it.mark_as_used_by_player( p );
1364 return 0;
1365}
1366
1367void firestarter_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1368{
1369 moves_cost_fast = obj.get_int( "moves", moves_cost_fast );
1370 moves_cost_slow = obj.get_int( "moves_slow", moves_cost_fast * 10 );
1371 need_sunlight = obj.get_bool( "need_sunlight", false );
1372}
1373
1374std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> firestarter_actor::clone() const
1375{
1376 return std::make_unique<firestarter_actor>( *this );
1377}
1378
1379bool firestarter_actor::prep_firestarter_use( const player &p, tripoint &pos )
1380{
1381 // checks for fuel are handled by use and the activity, not here
1382 if( pos == p.pos() ) {
1383 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Light where?" ) ) ) {
1384 pos = *pnt_;
1385 } else {
1386 return false;
1387 }
1388 }
1389 if( pos == p.pos() ) {
1390 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You would set yourself on fire." ) );
1391 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "But you're already smokin' hot." ) );
1392 return false;
1393 }
1394 map &here = get_map();
1395 if( here.get_field( pos, fd_fire ) ) {
1396 // check if there's already a fire
1397 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is already a fire." ) );
1398 return false;
1399 }
1400 // Check for a brazier.
1401 bool has_unactivated_brazier = false;
1402 for( const item &i : here.i_at( pos ) ) {
1403 if( i.typeId() == itype_brazier ) {
1404 has_unactivated_brazier = true;
1405 }
1406 }
1407 return !has_unactivated_brazier ||
1408 query_yn(
1409 _( "There's a brazier there but you haven't set it up to contain the fire. Continue?" ) );
1410}
1411
1412void firestarter_actor::resolve_firestarter_use( player &p, const tripoint &pos )
1413{
1414 if( get_map().add_field( pos, fd_fire, 1, 10_minutes ) ) {
1415 if( !p.has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
1416 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You successfully light a fire." ) );
1417 } else {
1418 if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
1419 p.add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
1420 _( "You light a fire, but it isn't enough. You need to light more." ) );
1421 } else {
1422 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You happily light a fire." ) );
1423 p.add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 6_hours, 4_hours );
1424 p.rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
1425 }
1426 }
1427 }
1428}
1429
1430ret_val<bool> firestarter_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
1431 const tripoint & ) const
1432{
1433 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
1434 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
1435 }
1436
1437 if( it.ammo_remaining() < it.ammo_required() ) {
1438 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." ) );
1439 }
1440
1441 if( need_sunlight && light_mod( p.pos() ) <= 0.0f ) {
1442 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You need direct sunlight to light a fire with this." ) );
1443 }
1444
1445 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
1446}
1447
1448float firestarter_actor::light_mod( const tripoint &pos ) const
1449{
1450 if( !need_sunlight ) {
1451 return 1.0f;
1452 }
1453
1454 const float light_level = g->natural_light_level( pos.z );
1455 if( get_weather().weather_id->sun_intensity >= sun_intensity_type::normal &&
1456 light_level >= 60.0f && weather::is_sheltered( get_map(), pos ) ) {
1457 return std::pow( light_level / 80.0f, 8 );
1458 }
1459
1460 return 0.0f;
1461}
1462
1463int firestarter_actor::moves_cost_by_fuel( const tripoint &pos ) const
1464{
1465 map &here = get_map();
1466 if( here.flammable_items_at( pos, 100 ) ) {
1467 return moves_cost_fast;
1468 }
1469
1470 if( here.flammable_items_at( pos, 10 ) ) {
1471 return ( moves_cost_slow + moves_cost_fast ) / 2;
1472 }
1473
1474 return moves_cost_slow;
1475}
1476
1477int firestarter_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &spos ) const
1478{
1479 if( t ) {
1480 return 0;
1481 }
1482
1483 tripoint pos = spos;
1484 float light = light_mod( p.pos() );
1485 if( !prep_firestarter_use( p, pos ) ) {
1486 return 0;
1487 }
1488
1489 double skill_level = p.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
1490 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL speeds up fire starting */
1491 float moves_modifier = std::pow( 0.8, std::min( 5.0, skill_level ) );
1492 const int moves_base = moves_cost_by_fuel( pos );
1493 const double moves_per_turn = to_moves<double>( 1_turns );
1494 const int min_moves = std::min<int>(
1495 moves_base, std::sqrt( 1 + moves_base / moves_per_turn ) * moves_per_turn );
1496 const int moves = std::max<int>( min_moves, moves_base * moves_modifier ) / light;
1497 if( moves > to_moves<int>( 1_minutes ) ) {
1498 // If more than 1 minute, inform the player
1499 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_sunlight ?
1500 _( "If the current weather holds, it will take around %d minutes to light a fire." ) :
1501 _( "At your skill level, it will take around %d minutes to light a fire." ),
1502 moves / to_moves<int>( 1_minutes ) );
1503 } else if( moves < to_moves<int>( 2_turns ) && get_map().is_flammable( pos ) ) {
1504 // If less than 2 turns, don't start a long action
1505 resolve_firestarter_use( p, pos );
1506 p.mod_moves( -moves );
1507 return it.type->charges_to_use();
1508 }
1509
1510 // skill gains are handled by the activity, but stored here in the index field
1511 const int potential_skill_gain =
1512 moves_modifier + moves_cost_fast / 100.0 + 2;
1513 p.assign_activity( ACT_START_FIRE, moves, potential_skill_gain,
1514 0, it.tname() );
1515 p.activity.targets.push_back( item_location( p, &it ) );
1516 p.activity.values.push_back( g->natural_light_level( pos.z ) );
1517 p.activity.placement = pos;
1518 // charges to use are handled by the activity
1519 return 0;
1520}
1521
1522void salvage_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1523{
1524 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1525 assign( obj, "moves_per_part", moves_per_part );
1526
1527 if( obj.has_array( "material_whitelist" ) ) {
1528 material_whitelist.clear();
1529 assign( obj, "material_whitelist", material_whitelist );
1530 }
1531}
1532
1533std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> salvage_actor::clone() const
1534{
1535 return std::make_unique<salvage_actor>( *this );
1536}
1537
1538int salvage_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
1539{
1540 if( t ) {
1541 return 0;
1542 }
1543
1544 auto item_loc = game_menus::inv::salvage( p, this );
1545 if( !item_loc ) {
1546 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
1547 return 0;
1548 }
1549
1550 if( !try_to_cut_up( p, *item_loc.get_item() ) ) {
1551 // Messages should have already been displayed.
1552 return 0;
1553 }
1554
1555 return cut_up( p, it, item_loc );
1556}
1557
1558static const units::volume minimal_volume_to_cut = 250_ml;
1559
1560int salvage_actor::time_to_cut_up( const item &it ) const
1561{
1562 int count = it.volume() / minimal_volume_to_cut;
1563 return moves_per_part * count;
1564}
1565
1566bool salvage_actor::valid_to_cut_up( const item &it ) const
1567{
1568 if( it.is_null() ) {
1569 return false;
1570 }
1571 // There must be some historical significance to these items.
1572 if( !it.is_salvageable() ) {
1573 return false;
1574 }
1575 if( !it.only_made_of( material_whitelist ) ) {
1576 return false;
1577 }
1578 if( !it.contents.empty() ) {
1579 return false;
1580 }
1581 if( it.volume() < minimal_volume_to_cut ) {
1582 return false;
1583 }
1584
1585 return true;
1586}
1587
1588// it here is the item that is a candidate for being chopped up.
1589// This is the former valid_to_cut_up with all the messages and queries
1590bool salvage_actor::try_to_cut_up( player &p, item &it ) const
1591{
1592 int pos = p.get_item_position( &it );
1593
1594 if( it.is_null() ) {
1595 add_msg( m_info, _( "You do not have that item." ) );
1596 return false;
1597 }
1598 // There must be some historical significance to these items.
1599 if( !it.is_salvageable() ) {
1600 add_msg( m_info, _( "Can't salvage anything from %s." ), it.tname() );
1601 if( recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( it.typeId() ) ) {
1602 add_msg( m_info, _( "Try disassembling the %s instead." ), it.tname() );
1603 }
1604 return false;
1605 }
1606
1607 if( !it.only_made_of( material_whitelist ) ) {
1608 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is made of material that cannot be cut up." ), it.tname() );
1609 return false;
1610 }
1611 if( !it.contents.empty() ) {
1612 add_msg( m_info, _( "Please empty the %s before cutting it up." ), it.tname() );
1613 return false;
1614 }
1615 if( it.volume() < minimal_volume_to_cut ) {
1616 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is too small to salvage material from." ), it.tname() );
1617 return false;
1618 }
1619 // Softer warnings at the end so we don't ask permission and then tell them no.
1620 if( &it == &p.weapon ) {
1621 if( !query_yn( _( "You are wielding that, are you sure?" ) ) ) {
1622 return false;
1623 }
1624 } else if( pos == INT_MIN ) {
1625 // Not in inventory
1626 return true;
1627 } else if( pos < -1 ) {
1628 if( !query_yn( _( "You're wearing that, are you sure?" ) ) ) {
1629 return false;
1630 }
1631 }
1632
1633 return true;
1634}
1635
1636// function returns charges from it during the cutting process of the *cut.
1637// it cuts
1638// cut gets cut
1639int salvage_actor::cut_up( player &p, item &it, item_location &cut ) const
1640{
1641 const bool filthy = cut.get_item()->is_filthy();
1642 // total number of raw components == total volume of item.
1643 // This can go awry if there is a volume / recipe mismatch.
1644 int count = cut.get_item()->volume() / minimal_volume_to_cut;
1645 // Chance of us losing a material component to entropy.
1646 /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION reduces chance of losing components when cutting items up */
1647 int entropy_threshold = std::max( 5, 10 - p.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication ) );
1648 // What material components can we get back?
1649 std::vector<material_id> cut_material_components = cut.get_item()->made_of();
1650 // What materials do we salvage (ids and counts).
1651 std::map<itype_id, int> materials_salvaged;
1652
1653 // Final just in case check (that perhaps was not done elsewhere);
1654 if( cut.get_item() == &it ) {
1655 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can not cut the %s with itself." ), it.tname() );
1656 return 0;
1657 }
1658 if( !cut.get_item()->contents.empty() ) {
1659 // Should have been ensured by try_to_cut_up
1660 debugmsg( "tried to cut a non-empty item %s", cut.get_item()->tname() );
1661 return 0;
1662 }
1663
1664 // Time based on number of components.
1665 p.moves -= moves_per_part * count;
1666 // Not much practice, and you won't get very far ripping things up.
1667 p.practice( skill_fabrication, rng( 0, 5 ), 1 );
1668
1669 // Higher fabrication, less chance of entropy, but still a chance.
1670 if( rng( 1, 10 ) <= entropy_threshold ) {
1671 count -= 1;
1672 }
1673 // Fail dex roll, potentially lose more parts.
1674 /** @EFFECT_DEX randomly reduces component loss when cutting items up */
1675 if( dice( 3, 4 ) > p.dex_cur ) {
1676 count -= rng( 0, 2 );
1677 }
1678 // If more than 1 material component can still be salvaged,
1679 // chance of losing more components if the item is damaged.
1680 // If the item being cut is not damaged, no additional losses will be incurred.
1681 if( count > 0 && cut.get_item()->damage() > 0 ) {
1682 float component_success_chance = std::min( std::pow( 0.8, cut.get_item()->damage_level( 4 ) ),
1683 1.0 );
1684 for( int i = count; i > 0; i-- ) {
1685 if( component_success_chance < rng_float( 0, 1 ) ) {
1686 count--;
1687 }
1688 }
1689 }
1690
1691 // Decided to split components evenly. Since salvage will likely change
1692 // soon after I write this, I'll go with the one that is cleaner.
1693 for( const material_id &material : cut_material_components ) {
1694 if( const auto id = material->salvaged_into() ) {
1695 materials_salvaged[*id] = std::max( 0, count / static_cast<int>( cut_material_components.size() ) );
1696 }
1697 }
1698
1699 add_msg( m_info, _( "You try to salvage materials from the %s." ),
1700 cut.get_item()->tname() );
1701
1702 item_location::type cut_type = cut.where();
1703 tripoint pos = cut.position();
1704
1705 // Clean up before removing the item.
1706 remove_ammo( *cut.get_item(), p );
1707 // Original item has been consumed.
1708 cut.remove_item();
1709 // Force an encumbrance update in case they were wearing that item.
1710 p.reset_encumbrance();
1711
1712 map &here = get_map();
1713 for( const auto &salvaged : materials_salvaged ) {
1714 itype_id mat_name = salvaged.first;
1715 int amount = salvaged.second;
1716 item result( mat_name, calendar::turn );
1717 if( amount > 0 ) {
1718 add_msg( m_good, vgettext( "Salvaged %1$i %2$s.", "Salvaged %1$i %2$s.", amount ),
1719 amount, result.display_name( amount ) );
1720 if( filthy ) {
1721 result.set_flag( "FILTHY" );
1722 }
1723 if( cut_type == item_location::type::character ) {
1724 p.i_add_or_drop( result, amount );
1725 } else {
1726 for( int i = 0; i < amount; i++ ) {
1727 here.spawn_an_item( pos.xy(), result, amount, 0 );
1728 }
1729 }
1730 } else {
1731 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Could not salvage a %s." ), result.display_name() );
1732 }
1733 }
1734 // No matter what, cutting has been done by the time we get here.
1735 return cost >= 0 ? cost : it.ammo_required();
1736}
1737
1738void inscribe_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1739{
1740 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1741 assign( obj, "on_items", on_items );
1742 assign( obj, "on_terrain", on_terrain );
1743 assign( obj, "material_restricted", material_restricted );
1744
1745 if( obj.has_array( "material_whitelist" ) ) {
1746 material_whitelist.clear();
1747 assign( obj, "material_whitelist", material_whitelist );
1748 }
1749
1750 assign( obj, "verb", verb );
1751 assign( obj, "gerund", gerund );
1752
1753 if( !on_items && !on_terrain ) {
1754 obj.throw_error(
1755 R"(Tried to create an useless inscribe_actor, at least on of "on_items" or "on_terrain" should be true)" );
1756 }
1757}
1758
1759std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> inscribe_actor::clone() const
1760{
1761 return std::make_unique<inscribe_actor>( *this );
1762}
1763
1764bool inscribe_actor::item_inscription( item &tool, item &cut ) const
1765{
1766 if( !cut.made_of( SOLID ) ) {
1767 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't inscribe an item that isn't solid!" ) );
1768 return false;
1769 }
1770
1771 if( material_restricted && !cut.made_of_any( material_whitelist ) ) {
1772 std::string lower_verb = verb.translated();
1773 std::transform( lower_verb.begin(), lower_verb.end(), lower_verb.begin(), ::tolower );
1774 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't %1$s %2$s because of the material it is made of." ),
1775 lower_verb, cut.display_name() );
1776 return false;
1777 }
1778
1779 enum inscription_type {
1780 INSCRIPTION_LABEL,
1781 INSCRIPTION_NOTE,
1782 };
1783
1784 uilist menu;
1785 menu.text = string_format( _( "%s meaning?" ), verb );
1786 menu.addentry( INSCRIPTION_LABEL, true, -1, _( "It's a label" ) );
1787 menu.addentry( INSCRIPTION_NOTE, true, -1, _( "It's a note" ) );
1788 menu.query();
1789
1790 std::string carving;
1791 std::string carving_tool;
1792 switch( menu.ret ) {
1793 case INSCRIPTION_LABEL:
1794 carving = "item_label";
1795 carving_tool = "item_label_tool";
1796 break;
1797 case INSCRIPTION_NOTE:
1798 carving = "item_note";
1799 carving_tool = "item_note_tool";
1800 break;
1801 default:
1802 return false;
1803 }
1804
1805 const bool hasnote = cut.has_var( carving );
1806 std::string messageprefix = ( hasnote ? _( "(To delete, clear the text and confirm)\n" ) : "" ) +
1807 //~ %1$s: gerund (e.g. carved), %2$s: item name
1808 string_format( pgettext( "carving", "%1$s on the %2$s is: " ),
1809 gerund, cut.type_name() );
1810
1811 string_input_popup popup;
1812 popup.title( string_format( _( "%s what?" ), verb ) )
1813 .width( 64 )
1814 .text( hasnote ? cut.get_var( carving ) : std::string() )
1815 .description( messageprefix )
1816 .identifier( "inscribe_item" )
1817 .max_length( 128 )
1818 .query();
1819 if( popup.canceled() ) {
1820 return false;
1821 }
1822 const std::string message = popup.text();
1823 if( message.empty() ) {
1824 cut.erase_var( carving );
1825 cut.erase_var( carving_tool );
1826 } else {
1827 cut.set_var( carving, message );
1828 cut.set_var( carving_tool, tool.typeId().str() );
1829 }
1830
1831 return true;
1832}
1833
1834int inscribe_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
1835{
1836 if( t ) {
1837 return 0;
1838 }
1839
1840 int choice = INT_MAX;
1841 if( on_terrain && on_items ) {
1842 uilist imenu;
1843 imenu.text = string_format( _( "%s on what?" ), verb );
1844 imenu.addentry( 0, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "The terrain" ) );
1845 imenu.addentry( 1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "An item" ) );
1846 imenu.query();
1847 choice = imenu.ret;
1848 } else if( on_terrain ) {
1849 choice = 0;
1850 } else {
1851 choice = 1;
1852 }
1853
1854 if( choice < 0 || choice > 1 ) {
1855 return 0;
1856 }
1857
1858 if( choice == 0 ) {
1859 const cata::optional<tripoint> dest_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Write where?" ) );
1860 if( !dest_ ) {
1861 return 0;
1862 }
1863 return iuse::handle_ground_graffiti( p, &it, string_format( _( "%s what?" ), verb ),
1864 dest_.value() );
1865 }
1866
1867 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_menu( get_avatar(), _( "Inscribe which item?" ) );
1868 if( !loc ) {
1869 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
1870 return 0;
1871 }
1872 item &cut = *loc;
1873 if( &cut == &it ) {
1874 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You try to bend your %s, but fail." ), it.tname() );
1875 return 0;
1876 }
1877 // inscribe_item returns false if the action fails or is canceled somehow.
1878
1879 if( item_inscription( it, cut ) ) {
1880 return cost >= 0 ? cost : it.ammo_required();
1881 }
1882
1883 return 0;
1884}
1885
1886void cauterize_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1887{
1888 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1889 assign( obj, "flame", flame );
1890}
1891
1892std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> cauterize_actor::clone() const
1893{
1894 return std::make_unique<cauterize_actor>( *this );
1895}
1896
1897static heal_actor prepare_dummy()
1898{
1899 heal_actor dummy;
1900 dummy.limb_power = -2;
1901 dummy.head_power = -2;
1902 dummy.torso_power = -2;
1903 dummy.bleed = 1.0f;
1904 dummy.bite = 0.5f;
1905 dummy.move_cost = 100;
1906 return dummy;
1907}
1908
1909bool cauterize_actor::cauterize_effect( player &p, item &it, bool force )
1910{
1911 // TODO: Make this less hacky
1912 static const heal_actor dummy = prepare_dummy();
1913 hp_part hpart = dummy.use_healing_item( p, p, it, force );
1914 if( hpart != num_hp_parts ) {
1915 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You cauterize yourself." ) );
1916 if( !( p.has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) ) ) {
1917 p.mod_pain( 15 );
1918 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It hurts like hell!" ) );
1919 } else {
1920 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "It itches a little." ) );
1921 }
1922 const body_part bp = player::hp_to_bp( hpart );
1923 if( p.has_effect( effect_bite, bp ) ) {
1924 p.add_effect( effect_bite, 260_minutes, bp );
1925 }
1926
1927 p.moves = 0;
1928 return true;
1929 }
1930
1931 return false;
1932}
1933
1934int cauterize_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
1935{
1936 if( t ) {
1937 return 0;
1938 }
1939 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
1940 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
1941 return 0;
1942 }
1943 bool has_disease = p.has_effect( effect_bite ) || p.has_effect( effect_bleed );
1944 bool did_cauterize = false;
1945
1946 if( has_disease ) {
1947 did_cauterize = cauterize_effect( p, it, false );
1948 } else {
1949 const bool can_have_fun = p.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST ) || p.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST_MED ) ||
1950 p.has_trait( trait_CENOBITE );
1951
1952 if( can_have_fun && query_yn( _( "Cauterize yourself for fun?" ) ) ) {
1953 did_cauterize = cauterize_effect( p, it, true );
1954 }
1955 }
1956
1957 if( !did_cauterize ) {
1958 return 0;
1959 }
1960
1961 if( flame ) {
1962 p.use_charges( itype_fire, 4 );
1963 return 0;
1964
1965 } else {
1966 return cost >= 0 ? cost : it.ammo_required();
1967 }
1968}
1969
1970ret_val<bool> cauterize_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
1971 const tripoint & ) const
1972{
1973 if( !p.has_effect( effect_bite ) &&
1974 !p.has_effect( effect_bleed ) &&
1975 !p.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST ) &&
1976 !p.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST_MED ) &&
1977 !p.has_trait( trait_CENOBITE ) ) {
1978
1979 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure(
1980 _( "You are not bleeding or bitten, there is no need to cauterize yourself." ) );
1981 }
1982 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
1983 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You cannot cauterize while mounted." ) );
1984 }
1985
1986 if( flame ) {
1987 if( !p.has_charges( itype_fire, 4 ) ) {
1988 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure(
1989 _( "You need a source of flame (4 charges worth) before you can cauterize yourself." ) );
1990 }
1991 } else {
1992 if( !it.units_sufficient( p ) ) {
1993 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You need at least %d charges to cauterize wounds." ),
1994 it.ammo_required() );
1995 }
1996 }
1997
1998 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
1999 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
2000 }
2001
2002 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2003}
2004
2005void enzlave_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2006{
2007 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
2008}
2009
2010std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> enzlave_actor::clone() const
2011{
2012 return std::make_unique<enzlave_actor>( *this );
2013}
2014
2015int enzlave_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2016{
2017 if( t ) {
2018 return 0;
2019 }
2020 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2021 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
2022 return 0;
2023 }
2024 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( point( p.posx(), p.posy() ) );
2025 std::vector<const item *> corpses;
2026
2027 for( item &corpse_candidate : items ) {
2028 const mtype *mt = corpse_candidate.get_mtype();
2029 if( corpse_candidate.is_corpse() && mt->in_species( ZOMBIE ) &&
2030 mt->made_of( material_id( "flesh" ) ) &&
2031 mt->in_species( HUMAN ) && corpse_candidate.active && !corpse_candidate.has_var( "zlave" ) ) {
2032 corpses.push_back( &corpse_candidate );
2033 }
2034 }
2035
2036 if( corpses.empty() ) {
2037 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "No suitable corpses" ) );
2038 return 0;
2039 }
2040
2041 int tolerance_level = 9;
2042 if( p.has_trait( trait_PSYCHOPATH ) || p.has_trait( trait_SAPIOVORE ) ) {
2043 tolerance_level = 0;
2044 } else if( p.has_trait_flag( "PRED4" ) ) {
2045 tolerance_level = 5;
2046 } else if( p.has_trait_flag( "PRED3" ) ) {
2047 tolerance_level = 7;
2048 }
2049
2050 // Survival skill increases your willingness to get things done,
2051 // but it doesn't make you feel any less bad about it.
2052 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases tolerance for enzlavement */
2053 if( p.get_morale_level() <= ( 15 * ( tolerance_level - p.get_skill_level(
2054 skill_survival ) ) ) - 150 ) {
2055 add_msg( m_neutral,
2056 _( "The prospect of cutting up the corpse and letting it rise again as a slave is too much for you to deal with right now." ) );
2057 return 0;
2058 }
2059
2060 uilist amenu;
2061
2062 amenu.text = _( "Selectively butcher the downed zombie into a zombie slave?" );
2063 for( size_t i = 0; i < corpses.size(); i++ ) {
2064 amenu.addentry( i, true, -1, corpses[i]->display_name() );
2065 }
2066
2067 amenu.query();
2068
2069 if( amenu.ret < 0 ) {
2070 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Make love, not zlave." ) );
2071 return 0;
2072 }
2073
2074 if( tolerance_level == 0 ) {
2075 // You just don't care, no message.
2076 } else if( tolerance_level <= 5 ) {
2077 add_msg( m_neutral, _( "Well, it's more constructive than just chopping 'em into gooey meat" ) );
2078 } else {
2079 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You feel horrible for mutilating and enslaving someone's corpse." ) );
2080
2081 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL decreases moral penalty and duration for enzlavement */
2082 int moraleMalus = -50 * ( 5.0 / p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2083 int maxMalus = -250 * ( 5.0 / p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2084 time_duration duration = 30_minutes * ( 5.0 / p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2085 time_duration decayDelay = 3_minutes * ( 5.0 / p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2086
2087 if( p.has_trait( trait_PACIFIST ) ) {
2088 moraleMalus *= 5;
2089 maxMalus *= 3;
2090 } else if( p.has_trait_flag( "PRED1" ) ) {
2091 moraleMalus /= 4;
2092 } else if( p.has_trait_flag( "PRED2" ) ) {
2093 moraleMalus /= 5;
2094 }
2095
2096 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTILATE_CORPSE, moraleMalus, maxMalus, duration, decayDelay );
2097 }
2098
2099 const int selected_corpse = amenu.ret;
2100
2101 const item *body = corpses[selected_corpse];
2102 const mtype *mt = body->get_mtype();
2103
2104 // HP range for zombies is roughly 36 to 120, with the really big ones having 180 and 480 hp.
2105 // Speed range is 20 - 120 (for humanoids, dogs get way faster)
2106 // This gives us a difficulty ranging roughly from 10 - 40, with up to +25 for corpse damage.
2107 // An average zombie with an undamaged corpse is 0 + 8 + 14 = 22.
2108 int difficulty = ( body->damage_level( 4 ) * 5 ) + ( mt->hp / 10 ) + ( mt->speed / 5 );
2109 // 0 - 30
2110 /** @EFFECT_DEX increases chance of success for enzlavement */
2111
2112 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases chance of success for enzlavement */
2113
2114 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases chance of success for enzlavement */
2115 int skills = p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) + p.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) +
2116 ( p.dex_cur / 2 );
2117 skills *= 2;
2118
2119 int success = rng( 0, skills ) - rng( 0, difficulty );
2120
2121 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID speeds up enzlavement */
2122 const int moves = difficulty * to_moves<int>( 12_seconds ) / p.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
2123
2124 p.assign_activity( ACT_MAKE_ZLAVE, moves );
2125 p.activity.values.push_back( success );
2126 p.activity.str_values.push_back( corpses[selected_corpse]->display_name() );
2127
2128 return cost >= 0 ? cost : it.ammo_required();
2129}
2130
2131ret_val<bool> enzlave_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &, bool,
2132 const tripoint & ) const
2133{
2134 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL >=1 allows enzlavement */
2135
2136 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID >=1 allows enzlavement */
2137
2138 // TODO: Extract such checks into some kind of 'stat_requirements' class.
2139 if( p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) < 1 ) {
2140 //~ %s - name of the required skill.
2141 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You need at least %s 1." ),
2142 skill_survival->name() );
2143 }
2144 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2145 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
2146 }
2147 if( p.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) < 1 ) {
2148 //~ %s - name of the required skill.
2149 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You need at least %s 1." ),
2150 skill_firstaid->name() );
2151 }
2152
2153 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2154}
2155
2156void fireweapon_off_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2157{
2158 obj.read( "target_id", target_id, true );
2159 success_message = obj.get_string( "success_message", "hsss" );
2160 lacks_fuel_message = obj.get_string( "lacks_fuel_message" );
2161 failure_message = obj.get_string( "failure_message", "hsss" );
2162 noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
2163 moves = obj.get_int( "moves", 0 );
2164 success_chance = obj.get_int( "success_chance", INT_MIN );
2165}
2166
2167std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> fireweapon_off_actor::clone() const
2168{
2169 return std::make_unique<fireweapon_off_actor>( *this );
2170}
2171
2172int fireweapon_off_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2173{
2174 if( t ) {
2175 return 0;
2176 }
2177
2178 if( it.charges <= 0 ) {
2179 p.add_msg_if_player( _( lacks_fuel_message ) );
2180 return 0;
2181 }
2182
2183 p.moves -= moves;
2184 if( rng( 0, 10 ) - it.damage_level( 4 ) > success_chance && !p.is_underwater() ) {
2185 if( noise > 0 ) {
2186 sounds::sound( p.pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( success_message ) );
2187 } else {
2188 p.add_msg_if_player( _( success_message ) );
2189 }
2190
2191 it.convert( target_id );
2192 it.active = true;
2193 } else if( !failure_message.empty() ) {
2194 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( failure_message ) );
2195 }
2196
2197 return it.type->charges_to_use();
2198}
2199
2200ret_val<bool> fireweapon_off_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
2201 const tripoint & ) const
2202{
2203 if( it.charges < it.type->charges_to_use() ) {
2204 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." ) );
2205 }
2206
2207 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2208 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
2209 }
2210
2211 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2212}
2213
2214void fireweapon_on_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2215{
2216 noise_message = obj.get_string( "noise_message", "hsss" );
2217 voluntary_extinguish_message = obj.get_string( "voluntary_extinguish_message" );
2218 charges_extinguish_message = obj.get_string( "charges_extinguish_message" );
2219 water_extinguish_message = obj.get_string( "water_extinguish_message" );
2220 noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
2221 noise_chance = obj.get_int( "noise_chance", 1 );
2222 auto_extinguish_chance = obj.get_int( "auto_extinguish_chance", 0 );
2223 if( auto_extinguish_chance > 0 ) {
2224 auto_extinguish_message = obj.get_string( "auto_extinguish_message" );
2225 }
2226}
2227
2228std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> fireweapon_on_actor::clone() const
2229{
2230 return std::make_unique<fireweapon_on_actor>( *this );
2231}
2232
2233int fireweapon_on_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2234{
2235 bool extinguish = true;
2236 if( it.charges == 0 ) {
2237 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( charges_extinguish_message ) );
2238 } else if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2239 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( water_extinguish_message ) );
2240 } else if( auto_extinguish_chance > 0 && one_in( auto_extinguish_chance ) ) {
2241 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( auto_extinguish_message ) );
2242 } else if( !t ) {
2243 p.add_msg_if_player( _( voluntary_extinguish_message ) );
2244 } else {
2245 extinguish = false;
2246 }
2247
2248 if( extinguish ) {
2249 it.deactivate( &p, false );
2250
2251 } else if( one_in( noise_chance ) ) {
2252 if( noise > 0 ) {
2253 sounds::sound( p.pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( noise_message ) );
2254 } else {
2255 p.add_msg_if_player( _( noise_message ) );
2256 }
2257 }
2258
2259 return it.type->charges_to_use();
2260}
2261
2262void manualnoise_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2263{
2264 no_charges_message = obj.get_string( "no_charges_message" );
2265 use_message = obj.get_string( "use_message" );
2266 noise_message = obj.get_string( "noise_message", "hsss" );
2267 noise_id = obj.get_string( "noise_id", "misc" );
2268 noise_variant = obj.get_string( "noise_variant", "default" );
2269 noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
2270 moves = obj.get_int( "moves", 0 );
2271}
2272
2273std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> manualnoise_actor::clone() const
2274{
2275 return std::make_unique<manualnoise_actor>( *this );
2276}
2277
2278int manualnoise_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2279{
2280 if( t ) {
2281 return 0;
2282 }
2283 if( it.type->charges_to_use() != 0 && it.charges < it.type->charges_to_use() ) {
2284 p.add_msg_if_player( _( no_charges_message ) );
2285 return 0;
2286 }
2287 {
2288 p.moves -= moves;
2289 if( noise > 0 ) {
2290 sounds::sound( p.pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::activity,
2291 noise_message.empty() ? _( "Hsss" ) : _( noise_message ), true, noise_id, noise_variant );
2292 }
2293 p.add_msg_if_player( _( use_message ) );
2294 }
2295 return it.type->charges_to_use();
2296}
2297
2298ret_val<bool> manualnoise_actor::can_use( const Character &, const item &it, bool,
2299 const tripoint & ) const
2300{
2301 if( it.charges < it.type->charges_to_use() ) {
2302 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." ) );
2303 }
2304
2305 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2306}
2307
2308std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> musical_instrument_actor::clone() const
2309{
2310 return std::make_unique<musical_instrument_actor>( *this );
2311}
2312
2313void musical_instrument_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2314{
2315 speed_penalty = obj.get_int( "speed_penalty", 10 );
2316 volume = obj.get_int( "volume" );
2317 fun = obj.get_int( "fun" );
2318 fun_bonus = obj.get_int( "fun_bonus", 0 );
2319 if( !obj.read( "description_frequency", description_frequency ) ) {
2320 obj.throw_error( "missing member \"description_frequency\"" );
2321 }
2322 player_descriptions = obj.get_string_array( "player_descriptions" );
2323 npc_descriptions = obj.get_string_array( "npc_descriptions" );
2324}
2325
2326int musical_instrument_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2327{
2328 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2329 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You can't play music while mounted." ),
2330 _( "<npcname> can't play music while mounted." ) );
2331 it.active = false;
2332 return 0;
2333 }
2334 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2335 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2336 _( "You can't play music underwater" ),
2337 _( "<npcname> can't play music underwater" ) );
2338 it.active = false;
2339 return 0;
2340 }
2341
2342 if( p.has_effect( effect_sleep ) || p.has_effect( effect_stunned ) ||
2343 p.has_effect( effect_asthma ) ) {
2344 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2345 _( "You stop playing your %s" ),
2346 _( "<npcname> stops playing their %s" ),
2347 it.display_name() );
2348 it.active = false;
2349 return 0;
2350 }
2351
2352 if( !t && it.active ) {
2353 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You stop playing your %s" ),
2354 _( "<npcname> stops playing their %s" ),
2355 it.display_name() );
2356 it.active = false;
2357 return 0;
2358 }
2359
2360 // Check for worn or wielded - no "floating"/bionic instruments for now
2361 // TODO: Distinguish instruments played with hands and with mouth, consider encumbrance
2362 const int inv_pos = p.get_item_position( &it );
2363 if( inv_pos >= 0 || inv_pos == INT_MIN ) {
2364 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2365 _( "You need to hold or wear %s to play it" ),
2366 _( "<npcname> needs to hold or wear %s to play it" ),
2367 it.display_name() );
2368 it.active = false;
2369 return 0;
2370 }
2371
2372 // At speed this low you can't coordinate your actions well enough to play the instrument
2373 if( p.get_speed() <= 25 + speed_penalty ) {
2374 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2375 _( "You feel too weak to play your %s" ),
2376 _( "<npcname> feels too weak to play their %s" ),
2377 it.display_name() );
2378 it.active = false;
2379 return 0;
2380 }
2381
2382 // We can play the music now
2383 if( !it.active ) {
2384 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
2385 _( "You start playing your %s" ),
2386 _( "<npcname> starts playing their %s" ),
2387 it.display_name() );
2388 it.active = true;
2389 }
2390
2391 if( p.get_effect_int( effect_playing_instrument ) <= speed_penalty ) {
2392 // Only re-apply the effect if it wouldn't lower the intensity
2393 p.add_effect( effect_playing_instrument, 2_turns, num_bp, speed_penalty );
2394 }
2395
2396 std::string desc = "music";
2397 /** @EFFECT_PER increases morale bonus when playing an instrument */
2398 const int morale_effect = fun + fun_bonus * p.per_cur;
2399 if( morale_effect >= 0 && calendar::once_every( description_frequency ) ) {
2400 if( !player_descriptions.empty() && p.is_player() ) {
2401 desc = _( random_entry( player_descriptions ) );
2402 } else if( !npc_descriptions.empty() && p.is_npc() ) {
2403 desc = string_format( _( "%1$s %2$s" ), p.disp_name( false ),
2404 random_entry( npc_descriptions ) );
2405 }
2406 } else if( morale_effect < 0 && calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
2407 // No musical skills = possible morale penalty
2408 if( p.is_player() ) {
2409 desc = _( "You produce an annoying sound" );
2410 } else {
2411 desc = string_format( _( "%s produces an annoying sound" ), p.disp_name( false ) );
2412 }
2413 }
2414
2415 if( morale_effect >= 0 ) {
2416 sounds::sound( p.pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::music, desc, true, "musical_instrument",
2417 it.typeId().str() );
2418 } else {
2419 sounds::sound( p.pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::music, desc, true, "musical_instrument_bad",
2420 it.typeId().str() );
2421 }
2422
2423 if( !p.has_effect( effect_music ) && p.can_hear( p.pos(), volume ) ) {
2424 // Sound code doesn't describe noises at the player position
2425 if( p.is_player() && desc != "music" ) {
2426 add_msg( m_info, desc );
2427 }
2428 p.add_effect( effect_music, 1_turns );
2429 const int sign = morale_effect > 0 ? 1 : -1;
2430 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUSIC, sign, morale_effect, 5_minutes, 2_minutes, true );
2431 }
2432
2433 return 0;
2434}
2435
2436ret_val<bool> musical_instrument_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &, bool,
2437 const tripoint & ) const
2438{
2439 // TODO: (maybe): Mouth encumbrance? Smoke? Lack of arms? Hand encumbrance?
2440 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2441 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
2442 }
2443 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2444 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while mounted." ) );
2445 }
2446
2447 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2448}
2449
2450std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> learn_spell_actor::clone() const
2451{
2452 return std::make_unique<learn_spell_actor>( *this );
2453}
2454
2455void learn_spell_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2456{
2457 spells = obj.get_string_array( "spells" );
2458}
2459
2460void learn_spell_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2461{
2462 std::string message;
2463 if( spells.size() == 1 ) {
2464 message = _( "This can teach you a spell." );
2465 } else {
2466 message = _( "This can teach you a number of spells." );
2467 }
2468 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2469 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "Spells Contained:" ) );
2470 for( const std::string &sp : spells ) {
2471 dump.emplace_back( "SPELL", spell_id( sp ).obj().name.translated() );
2472 }
2473}
2474
2475int learn_spell_actor::use( player &p, item &, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2476{
2477 if( !character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( p ) ) {
2478 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "It's too dark to read." ) );
2479 return 0;
2480 }
2481 std::vector<uilist_entry> uilist_initializer;
2482 uilist spellbook_uilist;
2483 spellbook_callback sp_cb;
2484 bool know_it_all = true;
2485 for( const std::string &sp_id_str : spells ) {
2486 const spell_id sp_id( sp_id_str );
2487 sp_cb.add_spell( sp_id );
2488 uilist_entry entry( sp_id.obj().name.translated() );
2489 if( p.magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
2490 const spell sp = p.magic->get_spell( sp_id );
2491 entry.ctxt = string_format( _( "Level %u" ), sp.get_level() );
2492 if( sp.is_max_level() ) {
2493 entry.ctxt += _( " (Max)" );
2494 entry.enabled = false;
2495 } else {
2496 know_it_all = false;
2497 }
2498 } else {
