2499 if( p.magic->can_learn_spell( p, sp_id ) ) {
2500 entry.ctxt = _( "Study to Learn" );
2501 know_it_all = false;
2502 } else {
2503 entry.ctxt = _( "Can't learn!" );
2504 entry.enabled = false;
2505 }
2506 }
2507 uilist_initializer.emplace_back( entry );
2508 }
2509
2510 if( know_it_all ) {
2511 add_msg( m_info, _( "You already know everything this could teach you." ) );
2512 return 0;
2513 }
2514
2515 spellbook_uilist.entries = uilist_initializer;
2516 spellbook_uilist.w_height_setup = 24;
2517 spellbook_uilist.w_width_setup = 80;
2518 spellbook_uilist.callback = &sp_cb;
2519 spellbook_uilist.title = _( "Study a spell:" );
2520 spellbook_uilist.pad_left_setup = 38;
2521 spellbook_uilist.query();
2522 const int action = spellbook_uilist.ret;
2523 if( action < 0 ) {
2524 return 0;
2525 }
2526 const bool knows_spell = p.magic->knows_spell( spells[action] );
2527 player_activity study_spell( ACT_STUDY_SPELL,
2528 p.magic->time_to_learn_spell( p, spells[action] ) );
2529 study_spell.str_values = {
2530 "", // reserved for "until you gain a spell level" option [0]
2531 "learn"
2532 }; // [1]
2533 study_spell.values = { 0, 0, 0 };
2534 if( knows_spell ) {
2535 study_spell.str_values[1] = "study";
2536 const int study_time = uilist( _( "Spend how long studying?" ), {
2537 { to_moves<int>( 30_minutes ), true, -1, _( "30 minutes" ) },
2538 { to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), true, -1, _( "1 hour" ) },
2539 { to_moves<int>( 2_hours ), true, -1, _( "2 hours" ) },
2540 { to_moves<int>( 4_hours ), true, -1, _( "4 hours" ) },
2541 { to_moves<int>( 8_hours ), true, -1, _( "8 hours" ) },
2542 { 10100, true, -1, _( "Until you gain a spell level" ) }
2543 } );
2544 if( study_time <= 0 ) {
2545 return 0;
2546 }
2547 study_spell.moves_total = study_time;
2548 }
2549 study_spell.moves_left = study_spell.moves_total;
2550 if( study_spell.moves_total == 10100 ) {
2551 study_spell.str_values[0] = "gain_level";
2552 study_spell.values[0] = 0; // reserved for xp
2553 study_spell.values[1] = p.magic->get_spell( spell_id( spells[action] ) ).get_level() + 1;
2554 }
2555 study_spell.name = spells[action];
2556 p.assign_activity( study_spell, false );
2557 return 0;
2558}
2559
2560std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> cast_spell_actor::clone() const
2561{
2562 return std::make_unique<cast_spell_actor>( *this );
2563}
2564
2565void cast_spell_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2566{
2567 no_fail = obj.get_bool( "no_fail" );
2568 item_spell = spell_id( obj.get_string( "spell_id" ) );
2569 spell_level = obj.get_int( "level" );
2570 need_worn = obj.get_bool( "need_worn", false );
2571 need_wielding = obj.get_bool( "need_wielding", false );
2572}
2573
2574void cast_spell_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2575{
2576 //~ %1$s: spell name, %2$i: spell level
2577 const std::string message = string_format( _( "This item casts %1$s at level %2$i." ),
2578 item_spell->name, spell_level );
2579 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2580 if( no_fail ) {
2581 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "This item never fails." ) );
2582 }
2583}
2584
2585int cast_spell_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2586{
2587 if( need_worn && !p.is_worn( it ) ) {
2588 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
2589 return 0;
2590 }
2591 if( need_wielding && !p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
2592 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
2593 return 0;
2594 }
2595
2596 spell casting = spell( spell_id( item_spell ) );
2597 int charges = it.type->charges_to_use();
2598
2599 player_activity cast_spell( ACT_SPELLCASTING, casting.casting_time( p ) );
2600 // [0] this is used as a spell level override for items casting spells
2601 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( spell_level );
2602 if( no_fail ) {
2603 // [1] if this value is 1, the spell never fails
2604 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 1 );
2605 } else {
2606 // [1]
2607 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 0 );
2608 }
2609 cast_spell.name = casting.id().c_str();
2610 if( it.has_flag( "USE_PLAYER_ENERGY" ) ) {
2611 // [2] this value overrides the mana cost if set to 0
2612 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 1 );
2613 charges = 0;
2614 } else {
2615 // [2]
2616 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 0 );
2617 }
2618 p.assign_activity( cast_spell, false );
2619 return charges;
2620}
2621
2622std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> holster_actor::clone() const
2623{
2624 return std::make_unique<holster_actor>( *this );
2625}
2626
2627void holster_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2628{
2629 holster_prompt = obj.get_string( "holster_prompt", "" );
2630 holster_msg = obj.get_string( "holster_msg", "" );
2631 assign( obj, "max_volume", max_volume );
2632 if( !assign( obj, "min_volume", min_volume ) ) {
2633 min_volume = max_volume / 3;
2634 }
2635
2636 assign( obj, "max_weight", max_weight );
2637 multi = obj.get_int( "multi", multi );
2638 draw_cost = obj.get_int( "draw_cost", draw_cost );
2639
2640 auto tmp = obj.get_string_array( "skills" );
2641 std::transform( tmp.begin(), tmp.end(), std::back_inserter( skills ),
2642 []( const std::string & elem ) {
2643 return skill_id( elem );
2644 } );
2645
2646 flags = obj.get_string_array( "flags" );
2647}
2648
2649bool holster_actor::can_holster( const item &obj ) const
2650{
2651 if( obj.volume() > max_volume || obj.volume() < min_volume ) {
2652 return false;
2653 }
2654 if( max_weight > 0_gram && obj.weight() > max_weight ) {
2655 return false;
2656 }
2657 if( obj.active ) {
2658 return false;
2659 }
2660 return std::any_of( flags.begin(), flags.end(), [&]( const std::string & f ) {
2661 return obj.has_flag( f );
2662 } ) ||
2663 std::find( skills.begin(), skills.end(), obj.gun_skill() ) != skills.end();
2664}
2665
2666bool holster_actor::store( player &p, item &holster, item &obj ) const
2667{
2668 if( obj.is_null() || holster.is_null() ) {
2669 debugmsg( "Null item was passed to holster_actor" );
2670 return false;
2671 }
2672
2673 // if selected item is unsuitable inform the player why not
2674 if( obj.volume() > max_volume ) {
2675 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %1$s is too big to fit in your %2$s" ),
2676 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2677 return false;
2678 }
2679
2680 if( obj.volume() < min_volume ) {
2681 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %1$s is too small to fit in your %2$s" ),
2682 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2683 return false;
2684 }
2685
2686 if( max_weight > 0_gram && obj.weight() > max_weight ) {
2687 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %1$s is too heavy to fit in your %2$s" ),
2688 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2689 return false;
2690 }
2691
2692 if( obj.active ) {
2693 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't think putting your %1$s in your %2$s is a good idea" ),
2694 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2695 return false;
2696 }
2697
2698 if( std::none_of( flags.begin(), flags.end(), [&]( const std::string & f ) {
2699 return obj.has_flag( f );
2700 } ) &&
2701 std::find( skills.begin(), skills.end(), obj.gun_skill() ) == skills.end() ) {
2702 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't put your %1$s in your %2$s" ),
2703 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2704 return false;
2705 }
2706
2707 p.add_msg_if_player( holster_msg.empty() ? _( "You holster your %s" ) : _( holster_msg ),
2708 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2709
2710 // holsters ignore penalty effects (e.g. GRABBED) when determining number of moves to consume
2711 p.store( holster, obj, false, draw_cost );
2712 return true;
2713}
2714
2715int holster_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2716{
2717 if( p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
2718 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need to unwield your %s before using it." ), it.tname() );
2719 return 0;
2720 }
2721
2722 int pos = 0;
2723 std::vector<std::string> opts;
2724
2725 if( static_cast<int>( it.contents.num_item_stacks() ) < multi ) {
2726 std::string prompt = holster_prompt.empty() ? _( "Holster item" ) : _( holster_prompt );
2727 opts.push_back( prompt );
2728 pos = -1;
2729 }
2730
2731 std::list<item *> top_contents{ it.contents.all_items_top() };
2732 std::transform( top_contents.begin(), top_contents.end(), std::back_inserter( opts ),
2733 []( const item * elem ) {
2734 return string_format( _( "Draw %s" ), elem->display_name() );
2735 } );
2736
2737 item *internal_item = nullptr;
2738 if( opts.size() > 1 ) {
2739 int ret = uilist( string_format( _( "Use %s" ), it.tname() ), opts );
2740 if( ret < 0 ) {
2741 pos = -2;
2742 } else {
2743 pos += ret;
2744 if( opts.size() != it.contents.num_item_stacks() ) {
2745 ret--;
2746 }
2747 auto iter = std::next( top_contents.begin(), ret );
2748 internal_item = *iter;
2749 }
2750 } else {
2751 internal_item = &it.contents.front();
2752 }
2753
2754 if( pos < -1 ) {
2755 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
2756 return 0;
2757 }
2758
2759 if( pos >= 0 ) {
2760 // worn holsters ignore penalty effects (e.g. GRABBED) when determining number of moves to consume
2761 if( p.is_worn( it ) ) {
2762 p.wield_contents( it, internal_item, false, draw_cost );
2763 } else {
2764 p.wield_contents( it, internal_item );
2765 }
2766
2767 } else {
2768 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::holster( p, it );
2769
2770 if( !loc ) {
2771 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
2772 return 0;
2773 }
2774
2775 store( p, it, *loc.obtain( p ) );
2776 }
2777
2778 return 0;
2779}
2780
2781void holster_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2782{
2783 std::string message = vgettext( "Can be activated to store a suitable item.",
2784 "Can be activated to store suitable items.", multi );
2785 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2786 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Num items: " ), "<num>", iteminfo::no_flags, multi );
2787 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Item volume: Min: " ),
2788 string_format( "<num> %s", volume_units_abbr() ),
2789 iteminfo::is_decimal | iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2790 convert_volume( min_volume.value() ) );
2791 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( " Max: " ),
2792 string_format( "<num> %s", volume_units_abbr() ),
2793 iteminfo::is_decimal,
2794 convert_volume( max_volume.value() ) );
2795
2796 if( max_weight > 0_gram ) {
2797 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Max item weight: " ),
2798 string_format( _( "<num> %s" ), weight_units() ),
2799 iteminfo::is_decimal,
2800 convert_weight( max_weight ) );
2801 }
2802}
2803
2804units::volume holster_actor::max_stored_volume() const
2805{
2806 return max_volume * multi;
2807}
2808
2809std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> bandolier_actor::clone() const
2810{
2811 return std::make_unique<bandolier_actor>( *this );
2812}
2813
2814void bandolier_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2815{
2816 capacity = obj.get_int( "capacity", capacity );
2817 ammo.clear();
2818 for( auto &e : obj.get_tags( "ammo" ) ) {
2819 ammo.insert( ammotype( e ) );
2820 }
2821
2822 draw_cost = obj.get_int( "draw_cost", draw_cost );
2823}
2824
2825void bandolier_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2826{
2827 if( !ammo.empty() ) {
2828 auto str = enumerate_as_string( ammo.begin(), ammo.end(),
2829 [&]( const ammotype & a ) {
2830 return string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>", a->name() );
2831 }, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
2832
2833 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", string_format(
2834 vgettext( "Can be activated to store a single round of ",
2835 "Can be activated to store up to <stat>%i</stat> rounds of ", capacity ),
2836 capacity ),
2837 str );
2838 }
2839}
2840
2841bool bandolier_actor::is_valid_ammo_type( const itype &t ) const
2842{
2843 if( !t.ammo ) {
2844 return false;
2845 }
2846 return ammo.count( t.ammo->type );
2847}
2848
2849bool bandolier_actor::can_store( const item &bandolier, const item &obj ) const
2850{
2851 if( !bandolier.contents.empty() && ( bandolier.contents.front().typeId() != obj.typeId() ||
2852 bandolier.contents.front().charges >= capacity ) ) {
2853 return false;
2854 }
2855
2856 return is_valid_ammo_type( *obj.type );
2857}
2858
2859bool bandolier_actor::reload( player &p, item &obj ) const
2860{
2861 if( !obj.is_bandolier() ) {
2862 debugmsg( "Invalid item passed to bandolier_actor" );
2863 return false;
2864 }
2865
2866 // find all nearby compatible ammo (matching type currently contained if appropriate)
2867 auto found = p.nearby( [&]( const item * e, const item * parent ) {
2868 return parent != &obj && can_store( obj, *e );
2869 } );
2870
2871 if( found.empty() ) {
2872 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "No matching ammo for the %1$s" ), obj.type_name() );
2873 return false;
2874 }
2875
2876 // convert these into reload options and display the selection prompt
2877 std::vector<item::reload_option> opts;
2878 std::transform( std::make_move_iterator( found.begin() ), std::make_move_iterator( found.end() ),
2879 std::back_inserter( opts ), [&]( item_location && e ) {
2880 return item::reload_option( &p, &obj, &obj, e );
2881 } );
2882
2883 item::reload_option sel = p.select_ammo( obj, std::move( opts ) );
2884 if( !sel ) {
2885 return false; // canceled menu
2886 }
2887
2888 p.mod_moves( -sel.moves() );
2889
2890 // add or stack the ammo dependent upon existing contents
2891 if( obj.contents.empty() ) {
2892 item put = sel.ammo->split( sel.qty() );
2893 if( !put.is_null() ) {
2894 obj.put_in( put );
2895 } else {
2896 obj.put_in( *sel.ammo );
2897 sel.ammo.remove_item();
2898 }
2899 } else {
2900 obj.contents.front().charges += sel.qty();
2901 if( sel.ammo->charges > sel.qty() ) {
2902 sel.ammo->charges -= sel.qty();
2903 } else {
2904 sel.ammo.remove_item();
2905 }
2906 }
2907
2908 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You store the %1$s in your %2$s" ),
2909 obj.contents.front().tname( sel.qty() ),
2910 obj.type_name() );
2911
2912 return true;
2913}
2914
2915int bandolier_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2916{
2917 if( p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
2918 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need to unwield your %s before using it." ),
2919 it.type_name() );
2920 return 0;
2921 }
2922
2923 uilist menu;
2924 menu.text = _( "Store ammo" );
2925
2926 std::vector<std::function<void()>> actions;
2927
2928 menu.addentry( -1, it.contents.empty() || it.contents.front().charges < capacity,
2929 'r', _( "Store ammo in %s" ), it.type_name() );
2930
2931 actions.emplace_back( [&] { reload( p, it ); } );
2932
2933 menu.addentry( -1, !it.contents.empty(), 'u', _( "Unload %s" ), it.type_name() );
2934
2935 actions.emplace_back( [&] {
2936 if( p.i_add_or_drop( it.contents.front() ) )
2937 {
2938 it.remove_item( it.contents.front() );
2939 } else
2940 {
2941 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
2942 }
2943 } );
2944
2945 menu.query();
2946 if( menu.ret >= 0 ) {
2947 actions[ menu.ret ]();
2948 }
2949
2950 return 0;
2951}
2952
2953units::volume bandolier_actor::max_stored_volume() const
2954{
2955 // This is relevant only for bandoliers with the non-rigid flag
2956
2957 // Find all valid ammo
2958 auto ammo_types = item_controller->find( [&]( const itype & t ) {
2959 return is_valid_ammo_type( t );
2960 } );
2961 // Figure out which has the greatest volume and calculate on that basis
2962 units::volume max_ammo_volume{};
2963 for( const auto *ammo_type : ammo_types ) {
2964 max_ammo_volume = std::max( max_ammo_volume, ammo_type->volume / ammo_type->stack_size );
2965 }
2966 return max_ammo_volume * capacity;
2967}
2968
2969std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> ammobelt_actor::clone() const
2970{
2971 return std::make_unique<ammobelt_actor>( *this );
2972}
2973
2974void ammobelt_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2975{
2976 belt = itype_id( obj.get_string( "belt" ) );
2977}
2978
2979void ammobelt_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2980{
2981 dump.emplace_back( "AMMO", string_format( _( "Can be used to assemble: %s" ),
2982 item::nname( belt ) ) );
2983}
2984
2985int ammobelt_actor::use( player &p, item &, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2986{
2987 item mag( belt );
2988 mag.ammo_unset();
2989
2990 if( !p.can_reload( mag ) ) {
2991 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Insufficient ammunition to assemble %s" ), mag.tname() );
2992 return 0;
2993 }
2994
2995 item::reload_option opt = p.select_ammo( mag, true );
2996 if( opt ) {
2997 p.assign_activity( ACT_RELOAD, opt.moves(), opt.qty() );
2998 p.activity.targets.emplace_back( p, &p.i_add( mag ) );
2999 p.activity.targets.push_back( std::move( opt.ammo ) );
3000 }
3001
3002 return 0;
3003}
3004
3005void repair_item_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3006{
3007 // Mandatory:
3008 for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "materials" ) ) {
3009 materials.emplace( line );
3010 }
3011
3012 // TODO: Make skill non-mandatory while still erroring on invalid skill
3013 const std::string skill_string = obj.get_string( "skill" );
3014 used_skill = skill_id( skill_string );
3015 if( !used_skill.is_valid() ) {
3016 obj.throw_error( "Invalid skill", "skill" );
3017 }
3018
3019 cost_scaling = obj.get_float( "cost_scaling" );
3020
3021 // Optional
3022 tool_quality = obj.get_int( "tool_quality", 0 );
3023 move_cost = obj.get_int( "move_cost", 500 );
3024 trains_skill_to = obj.get_int( "trains_skill_to", 5 ) - 1;
3025}
3026
3027bool repair_item_actor::can_use_tool( const player &p, const item &tool, bool print_msg ) const
3028{
3029 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
3030 if( print_msg ) {
3031 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
3032 }
3033 return false;
3034 }
3035 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
3036 if( print_msg ) {
3037 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You can't do that while mounted." ),
3038 _( "<npcname> can't do that while mounted." ) );
3039 }
3040 return false;
3041 }
3042 if( !character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( p ) ) {
3043 if( print_msg ) {
3044 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't see to do that!" ) );
3045 }
3046 return false;
3047 }
3048 if( !tool.units_sufficient( p ) ) {
3049 if( print_msg ) {
3050 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your tool does not have enough charges to do that." ) );
3051 }
3052 return false;
3053 }
3054
3055 return true;
3056}
3057
3058static item_location get_item_location( player &p, item &it, const tripoint &pos )
3059{
3060 // Item on a character
3061 if( p.has_item( it ) ) {
3062 return item_location( p, &it );
3063 }
3064
3065 // Item in a vehicle
3066 if( const optional_vpart_position &vp = get_map().veh_at( pos ) ) {
3067 vehicle_cursor vc( vp->vehicle(), vp->part_index() );
3068 bool found_in_vehicle = false;
3069 vc.visit_items( [&]( const item * e ) {
3070 if( e == &it ) {
3071 found_in_vehicle = true;
3072 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
3073 }
3074 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3075 } );
3076 if( found_in_vehicle ) {
3077 return item_location( vc, &it );
3078 }
3079 }
3080
3081 // Item on the map
3082 return item_location( pos, &it );
3083}
3084
3085int repair_item_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint &position ) const
3086{
3087 if( !can_use_tool( p, it, true ) ) {
3088 return 0;
3089 }
3090
3091 p.assign_activity( ACT_REPAIR_ITEM, 0, p.get_item_position( &it ), INT_MIN );
3092 // We also need to store the repair actor subtype in the activity
3093 p.activity.str_values.push_back( type );
3094 // storing of item_location to support repairs by tools on the ground
3095 p.activity.targets.emplace_back( get_item_location( p, it, position ) );
3096 // All repairs are done in the activity, including charge cost and target item selection
3097 return 0;
3098}
3099
3100std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> repair_item_actor::clone() const
3101{
3102 return std::make_unique<repair_item_actor>( *this );
3103}
3104
3105bool repair_item_actor::handle_components( player &pl, const item &fix,
3106 bool print_msg, bool just_check ) const
3107{
3108 // Entries valid for repaired items
3109 std::set<material_id> valid_entries;
3110 for( const auto &mat : materials ) {
3111 if( fix.made_of( mat ) ) {
3112 valid_entries.insert( mat );
3113 }
3114 }
3115
3116 if( valid_entries.empty() ) {
3117 if( print_msg ) {
3118 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is not made of any of:" ),
3119 fix.tname() );
3120 for( const auto &mat_name : materials ) {
3121 const auto &mat = mat_name.obj();
3122 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "%s (repaired using %s)" ), mat.name(),
3123 item::nname( mat.repaired_with(), 2 ) );
3124 }
3125 }
3126
3127 return false;
3128 }
3129
3130 const inventory &crafting_inv = pl.crafting_inventory();
3131
3132 // Repairing or modifying items requires at least 1 repair item,
3133 // otherwise number is related to size of item
3134 // Round up if checking, but roll if actually consuming
3135 // TODO: should 250_ml be part of the cost_scaling?
3136 const int items_needed = std::max<int>( 1, just_check ?
3137 std::ceil( fix.volume() / 250_ml * cost_scaling ) :
3138 roll_remainder( fix.volume() / 250_ml * cost_scaling ) );
3139
3140 std::function<bool( const item & )> filter;
3141 if( fix.is_filthy() ) {
3142 filter = []( const item & component ) {
3143 return component.allow_crafting_component();
3144 };
3145 } else {
3146 filter = is_crafting_component;
3147 }
3148
3149 // Go through all discovered repair items and see if we have any of them available
3150 std::vector<item_comp> comps;
3151 for( const auto &entry : valid_entries ) {
3152 const itype_id &component_id = entry.obj().repaired_with();
3153 // Certain (different!) materials are repaired with the same components (steel, iron, hard steel use scrap metal).
3154 // This checks avoids adding the same component twice, which is annoying to the user.
3155 if( std::find_if( comps.begin(), comps.end(), [&]( const item_comp & ic ) {
3156 return ic.type == component_id;
3157 } ) != comps.end() ) {
3158 continue;
3159 }
3160 if( item::count_by_charges( component_id ) ) {
3161 if( crafting_inv.has_charges( component_id, items_needed ) ) {
3162 comps.emplace_back( component_id, items_needed );
3163 }
3164 } else if( crafting_inv.has_amount( component_id, items_needed, false, filter ) ) {
3165 comps.emplace_back( component_id, items_needed );
3166 }
3167 }
3168
3169 if( comps.empty() ) {
3170 if( print_msg ) {
3171 for( const auto &entry : valid_entries ) {
3172 const auto &mat_comp = entry.obj().repaired_with();
3173 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
3174 _( "You don't have enough %s to do that. Have: %d, need: %d" ),
3175 item::nname( mat_comp, 2 ),
3176 mat_comp->count_by_charges() ?
3177 crafting_inv.amount_of( mat_comp, false ) :
3178 crafting_inv.charges_of( mat_comp, items_needed ),
3179 items_needed );
3180 }
3181 }
3182
3183 return false;
3184 }
3185
3186 if( !just_check ) {
3187 if( comps.empty() ) {
3188 // This shouldn't happen - the check in can_repair_target should prevent it
3189 // But report it, just in case
3190 debugmsg( "Attempted repair with no components" );
3191 }
3192
3193 pl.consume_items( comps, 1, filter );
3194 }
3195
3196 return true;
3197}
3198
3199// Find the difficulty of the recipes that result in id
3200// If the recipe is not known by the player, +1 to difficulty
3201// If player doesn't meet the requirements of the recipe, +1 to difficulty
3202// Returns -1 if no recipe is found
3203static int find_repair_difficulty( const player &pl, const itype_id &id, bool training )
3204{
3205 // If the recipe is not found, this will remain unchanged
3206 int min = -1;
3207 for( const auto &e : recipe_dict ) {
3208 const auto r = e.second;
3209 if( id != r.result() ) {
3210 continue;
3211 }
3212 // If this is the first time we found a recipe
3213 if( min == -1 ) {
3214 min = 5;
3215 }
3216
3217 int cur_difficulty = r.difficulty;
3218 if( !training && !pl.knows_recipe( &r ) ) {
3219 cur_difficulty++;
3220 }
3221
3222 if( !training && !pl.has_recipe_requirements( r ) ) {
3223 cur_difficulty++;
3224 }
3225
3226 min = std::min( cur_difficulty, min );
3227 }
3228
3229 return min;
3230}
3231
3232// Returns the level of the lowest level recipe that results in item of `fix`'s type
3233// Or if it has a repairs_like, the lowest level recipe that results in that.
3234// If the recipe doesn't exist, difficulty is 10
3235int repair_item_actor::repair_recipe_difficulty( const player &pl,
3236 const item &fix, bool training ) const
3237{
3238 int diff = find_repair_difficulty( pl, fix.typeId(), training );
3239
3240 // If we don't find a recipe, see if there's a repairs_like that has a recipe
3241 if( diff == -1 && !fix.type->repairs_like.is_empty() ) {
3242 diff = find_repair_difficulty( pl, fix.type->repairs_like, training );
3243 }
3244
3245 // If we still don't find a recipe, difficulty is 10
3246 if( diff == -1 ) {
3247 diff = 10;
3248 }
3249
3250 return diff;
3251}
3252
3253bool repair_item_actor::can_repair_target( player &pl, const item &fix,
3254 bool print_msg ) const
3255{
3256 // In some rare cases (indices getting scrambled after inventory overflow)
3257 // our `fix` can be a different item.
3258 if( fix.is_null() ) {
3259 if( print_msg ) {
3260 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" ) );
3261 }
3262 return false;
3263 }
3264 if( fix.is_firearm() ) {
3265 if( print_msg ) {
3266 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That requires gunsmithing tools." ) );
3267 }
3268 return false;
3269 }
3270 if( fix.count_by_charges() || fix.has_flag( "NO_REPAIR" ) ) {
3271 if( print_msg ) {
3272 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot repair this type of item." ) );
3273 }
3274 return false;
3275 }
3276
3277 if( any_of( materials.begin(), materials.end(), [&fix]( const material_id & mat ) {
3278 return mat.obj()
3279 .repaired_with() == fix.typeId();
3280 } ) ) {
3281 if( print_msg ) {
3282 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This can be used to repair other items, not itself." ) );
3283 }
3284 return false;
3285 }
3286
3287 if( !handle_components( pl, fix, print_msg, true ) ) {
3288 return false;
3289 }
3290
3291 const bool can_be_refitted = fix.has_flag( "VARSIZE" );
3292 if( can_be_refitted && !fix.has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
3293 return true;
3294 }
3295
3296 const bool resizing_matters = fix.get_encumber( pl ) != 0;
3297 const bool small = pl.get_size() == MS_TINY;
3298 const bool can_resize = small != fix.has_flag( "UNDERSIZE" );
3299 if( can_be_refitted && resizing_matters && can_resize ) {
3300 return true;
3301 }
3302
3303 if( fix.damage() > 0 ) {
3304 return true;
3305 }
3306
3307 if( fix.damage() <= fix.min_damage() ) {
3308 if( print_msg ) {
3309 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is already enhanced to its maximum potential." ),
3310 fix.tname() );
3311 }
3312 return false;
3313 }
3314
3315 if( fix.has_flag( "PRIMITIVE_RANGED_WEAPON" ) || !fix.reinforceable() ) {
3316 if( print_msg ) {
3317 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way." ),
3318 fix.tname() );
3319 }
3320 return false;
3321 }
3322
3323 return true;
3324}
3325
3326std::pair<float, float> repair_item_actor::repair_chance(
3327 const player &pl, const item &fix, repair_item_actor::repair_type action_type ) const
3328{
3329 /** @EFFECT_TAILOR randomly improves clothing repair efforts */
3330 /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS randomly improves metal repair efforts */
3331 const int skill = pl.get_skill_level( used_skill );
3332 const int recipe_difficulty = repair_recipe_difficulty( pl, fix );
3333 int action_difficulty = 0;
3334 switch( action_type ) {
3335 case RT_REPAIR:
3336 action_difficulty = fix.damage_level( 4 );
3337 break;
3338 case RT_REFIT:
3339 // Let's make refitting as hard as recovering an almost-wrecked item
3340 action_difficulty = fix.max_damage() / itype::damage_scale;
3341 break;
3342 case RT_REINFORCE:
3343 // Reinforcing is at least as hard as refitting
3344 action_difficulty = std::max( fix.max_damage() / itype::damage_scale, recipe_difficulty );
3345 break;
3346 case RT_PRACTICE:
3347 // Skill gain scales with recipe difficulty, so practice difficulty should too
3348 action_difficulty = recipe_difficulty;
3349 default:
3350 ;
3351 }
3352
3353 const int difficulty = recipe_difficulty + action_difficulty;
3354 // Sample numbers:
3355 // Item | Damage | Skill | Dex | Success | Failure
3356 // Hoodie | 2 | 3 | 10 | 6% | 0%
3357 // Hazmat | 1 | 10 | 10 | 8% | 0%
3358 // Hazmat | 1 | 5 | 20 | 0% | 2%
3359 // t-shirt| 4 | 1 | 5 | 2% | 3%
3360 // Duster | 2 | 5 | 5 | 10% | 0%
3361 // Duster | 2 | 2 | 10 | 4% | 1%
3362 // Duster | Refit | 2 | 10 | 0% | N/A
3363 float success_chance = ( 10 + 2 * skill - 2 * difficulty + tool_quality / 5.0f ) / 100.0f;
3364 /** @EFFECT_DEX reduces the chances of damaging an item when repairing */
3365 float damage_chance = ( difficulty - skill - ( tool_quality + pl.dex_cur ) / 5.0f ) / 100.0f;
3366
3367 damage_chance = std::max( 0.0f, std::min( 1.0f, damage_chance ) );
3368 success_chance = std::max( 0.0f, std::min( 1.0f - damage_chance, success_chance ) );
3369
3370 return std::make_pair( success_chance, damage_chance );
3371}
3372
3373repair_item_actor::repair_type repair_item_actor::default_action( const item &fix,
3374 int current_skill_level ) const
3375{
3376 if( fix.damage() > 0 ) {
3377 return RT_REPAIR;
3378 }
3379
3380 const bool can_be_refitted = fix.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE );
3381 const bool doesnt_fit = !fix.has_flag( flag_FIT );
3382 if( doesnt_fit && can_be_refitted ) {
3383 return RT_REFIT;
3384 }
3385
3386 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3387 const bool smol = player_character.get_size() == MS_TINY;
3388
3389 const bool is_undersized = fix.has_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
3390 const bool is_oversized = fix.has_flag( flag_OVERSIZE );
3391 const bool resizing_matters = fix.get_encumber( player_character ) != 0;
3392
3393 const bool too_big_while_smol = smol && !is_undersized && !is_oversized;
3394 if( too_big_while_smol && can_be_refitted && resizing_matters ) {
3395 return RT_DOWNSIZING;
3396 }
3397
3398 const bool too_small_while_big = !smol && is_undersized && !is_oversized;
3399 if( too_small_while_big && can_be_refitted && resizing_matters ) {
3400 return RT_UPSIZING;
3401 }
3402
3403 if( fix.damage() > fix.min_damage() ) {
3404 return RT_REINFORCE;
3405 }
3406
3407 if( current_skill_level <= trains_skill_to ) {
3408 return RT_PRACTICE;
3409 }
3410
3411 return RT_NOTHING;
3412}
3413
3414static bool damage_item( player &pl, item_location &fix )
3415{
3416 const std::string startdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3417 const auto destroyed = fix->inc_damage();
3418 const std::string resultdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3419 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You damage your %s! ( %s-> %s)" ), fix->tname( 1, false ),
3420 startdurability, resultdurability );
3421 if( destroyed ) {
3422 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You destroy it!" ) );
3423 if( fix.where() == item_location::type::character ) {
3424 pl.i_rem_keep_contents( pl.get_item_position( fix.get_item() ) );
3425 } else {
3426 for( const item *it : fix->contents.all_items_top() ) {
3427 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( pl, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { *it }, fix.position() );
3428 }
3429 fix.remove_item();
3430 }
3431
3432 return true;
3433 }
3434
3435 return false;
3436}
3437
3438repair_item_actor::attempt_hint repair_item_actor::repair( player &pl, item &tool,
3439 item_location &fix ) const
3440{
3441 if( !can_use_tool( pl, tool, true ) ) {
3442 return AS_CANT_USE_TOOL;
3443 }
3444 if( !can_repair_target( pl, *fix, true ) ) {
3445 return AS_CANT;
3446 }
3447
3448 const int current_skill_level = pl.get_skill_level( used_skill );
3449 const auto action = default_action( *fix, current_skill_level );
3450 const auto chance = repair_chance( pl, *fix, action );
3451 int practice_amount = repair_recipe_difficulty( pl, *fix, true ) / 2 + 1;
3452 float roll_value = rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 );
3453 enum roll_result {
3454 SUCCESS,
3455 FAILURE,
3456 NEUTRAL
3457 } roll;
3458
3459 if( roll_value > 1.0f - chance.second ) {
3460 roll = FAILURE;
3461 } else if( roll_value < chance.first ) {
3462 roll = SUCCESS;
3463 } else {
3464 roll = NEUTRAL;
3465 }
3466
3467 if( action == RT_NOTHING ) {
3468 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You won't learn anything more by doing that." ) );
3469 return AS_CANT;
3470 }
3471
3472 // If not for this if, it would spam a lot
3473 if( current_skill_level > trains_skill_to ) {
3474 practice_amount = 0;
3475 }
3476 pl.practice( used_skill, practice_amount, trains_skill_to );
3477
3478 if( roll == FAILURE ) {
3479 return damage_item( pl, fix ) ? AS_DESTROYED : AS_FAILURE;
3480 }
3481
3482 if( action == RT_PRACTICE ) {
3483 return AS_RETRY;
3484 }
3485
3486 if( action == RT_REPAIR ) {
3487 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3488 const std::string startdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3489 const auto damage = fix->damage();
3490 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3491 fix->set_damage( std::max( damage - itype::damage_scale, 0 ) );
3492 const std::string resultdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3493 if( damage > itype::damage_scale ) {
3494 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You repair your %s! ( %s-> %s)" ), fix->tname( 1, false ),
3495 startdurability, resultdurability );
3496 } else {
3497 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You repair your %s completely! ( %s-> %s)" ), fix->tname( 1,
3498 false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
3499 }
3500 return AS_SUCCESS;
3501 }
3502
3503 return AS_RETRY;
3504 }
3505
3506 if( action == RT_REFIT ) {
3507 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3508 if( !fix->has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
3509 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You take your %s in, improving the fit." ),
3510 fix->tname() );
3511 fix->set_flag( "FIT" );
3512 }
3513 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3514 return AS_SUCCESS;
3515 }
3516
3517 return AS_RETRY;
3518 }
3519
3520 if( action == RT_DOWNSIZING ) {
3521 //We don't need to check for smallness or undersize because DOWNSIZING already guarantees that
3522 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3523 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You resize the %s to accommodate your tiny build." ),
3524 fix->tname().c_str() );
3525 fix->set_flag( "UNDERSIZE" );
3526 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3527 return AS_SUCCESS;
3528 }
3529 return AS_RETRY;
3530 }
3531
3532 if( action == RT_UPSIZING ) {
3533 //We don't need to check for smallness or undersize because UPSIZING already guarantees that
3534 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3535 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You adjust the %s back to its normal size." ),
3536 fix->tname().c_str() );
3537 fix->unset_flag( "UNDERSIZE" );
3538 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3539 return AS_SUCCESS;
3540 }
3541 return AS_RETRY;
3542 }
3543
3544 if( action == RT_REINFORCE ) {
3545 if( fix->has_flag( "PRIMITIVE_RANGED_WEAPON" ) || !fix->reinforceable() ) {
3546 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way." ),
3547 fix->tname() );
3548 return AS_CANT;
3549 }
3550
3551 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3552 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You make your %s extra sturdy." ), fix->tname() );
3553 fix->mod_damage( -itype::damage_scale );
3554 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3555 return AS_SUCCESS;
3556 }
3557
3558 return AS_RETRY;
3559 }
3560
3561 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is already enhanced." ), fix->tname() );
3562 return AS_CANT;
3563}
3564
3565std::string repair_item_actor::action_description( repair_item_actor::repair_type rt )
3566{
3567 static const std::array<std::string, NUM_REPAIR_TYPES> arr = {{
3568 translate_marker( "Nothing" ),
3569 translate_marker( "Repairing" ),
3570 translate_marker( "Refitting" ),
3571 translate_marker( "Downsizing" ),
3572 translate_marker( "Upsizing" ),
3573 translate_marker( "Reinforcing" ),
3574 translate_marker( "Practicing" )
3575 }
3576 };
3577
3578 return _( arr[rt] );
3579}
3580
3581std::string repair_item_actor::get_name() const
3582{
3583 const std::string mats = enumerate_as_string( materials.begin(), materials.end(),
3584 []( const material_id & mid ) {
3585 return _( mid->name() );
3586 } );
3587 return string_format( _( "Repair %s" ), mats );
3588}
3589
3590void heal_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3591{
3592 // Mandatory
3593 move_cost = obj.get_int( "move_cost" );
3594 limb_power = obj.get_float( "limb_power", 0 );
3595
3596 // Optional
3597 bandages_power = obj.get_float( "bandages_power", 0 );
3598 bandages_scaling = obj.get_float( "bandages_scaling", 0.25f * bandages_power );
3599 disinfectant_power = obj.get_float( "disinfectant_power", 0 );
3600 disinfectant_scaling = obj.get_float( "disinfectant_scaling", 0.25f * disinfectant_power );
3601
3602 head_power = obj.get_float( "head_power", 0.8f * limb_power );
3603 torso_power = obj.get_float( "torso_power", 1.5f * limb_power );
3604
3605 limb_scaling = obj.get_float( "limb_scaling", 0.25f * limb_power );
3606 double scaling_ratio = limb_power < 0.0001f ? 0.0 :
3607 static_cast<double>( limb_scaling / limb_power );
3608 head_scaling = obj.get_float( "head_scaling", scaling_ratio * head_power );
3609 torso_scaling = obj.get_float( "torso_scaling", scaling_ratio * torso_power );
3610
3611 bleed = obj.get_float( "bleed", 0.0f );
3612 bite = obj.get_float( "bite", 0.0f );
3613 infect = obj.get_float( "infect", 0.0f );
3614
3615 long_action = obj.get_bool( "long_action", false );
3616
3617 if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
3618 for( const JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
3619 effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
3620 }
3621 }
3622
3623 if( obj.has_string( "used_up_item" ) ) {
3624 obj.read( "used_up_item", used_up_item_id, true );
3625 } else if( obj.has_object( "used_up_item" ) ) {
3626 JsonObject u = obj.get_object( "used_up_item" );
3627 u.read( "id", used_up_item_id, true );
3628 used_up_item_quantity = u.get_int( "quantity", used_up_item_quantity );
3629 used_up_item_charges = u.get_int( "charges", used_up_item_charges );
3630 used_up_item_flags = u.get_tags( "flags" );
3631 }
3632}
3633
3634static player &get_patient( player &healer, const tripoint &pos )
3635{
3636 if( healer.pos() == pos ) {
3637 return healer;
3638 }
3639
3640 player *const person = g->critter_at<player>( pos );
3641 if( !person ) {
3642 // Default to heal self on failure not to break old functionality
3643 add_msg( m_debug, "No heal target at position %d,%d,%d", pos.x, pos.y, pos.z );
3644 return healer;
3645 }
3646
3647 return *person;
3648}
3649
3650int heal_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint &pos ) const
3651{
3652 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
3653 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
3654 return 0;
3655 }
3656 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
3657 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while mounted." ) );
3658 return 0;
3659 }
3660 if( get_option<bool>( "FILTHY_WOUNDS" ) && it.is_filthy() ) {
3661 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't use filthy items for healing." ) );
3662 return 0;
3663 }
3664
3665 player &patient = get_patient( p, pos );
3666 const hp_part hpp = use_healing_item( p, patient, it, false );
3667 if( hpp == num_hp_parts ) {
3668 return 0;
3669 }
3670
3671 int cost = move_cost;
3672 if( long_action ) {
3673 // A hack: long action healing on NPCs isn't done yet.
3674 // So just heal at start and paralyze the player for 5 minutes.
3675 cost /= std::min( 10, p.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) + 1 );
3676 }
3677
3678 // NPCs can use first aid now, but they can't perform long actions
3679 if( long_action && &patient == &p && !p.is_npc() ) {
3680 // Assign first aid long action.
3681 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID speeds up firstaid activity */
3682 p.assign_activity( ACT_FIRSTAID, cost, 0, 0, it.tname() );
3683 p.activity.targets.push_back( item_location( p, &it ) );
3684 p.activity.values.push_back( hpp );
3685 p.moves = 0;
3686 return 0;
3687 }
3688
3689 p.moves -= cost;
3690 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You use your %s." ), it.tname() );
3691 return it.type->charges_to_use();
3692}
3693
3694std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> heal_actor::clone() const
3695{
3696 return std::make_unique<heal_actor>( *this );
3697}
3698
3699int heal_actor::get_heal_value( const Character &healer, hp_part healed ) const
3700{
3701 int heal_base;
3702 float bonus_mult;
3703 if( healed == hp_head ) {
3704 heal_base = head_power;
3705 bonus_mult = head_scaling;
3706 } else if( healed == hp_torso ) {
3707 heal_base = torso_power;
3708 bonus_mult = torso_scaling;
3709 } else {
3710 heal_base = limb_power;
3711 bonus_mult = limb_scaling;
3712 }
3713
3714 if( heal_base > 0 ) {
3715 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3716 return heal_base + bonus_mult * healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3717 }
3718
3719 return heal_base;
3720}
3721
3722int heal_actor::get_bandaged_level( const Character &healer ) const
3723{
3724 if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3725 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3726 return bandages_power + bandages_scaling * healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3727 }
3728
3729 return bandages_power;
3730}
3731
3732int heal_actor::get_disinfected_level( const Character &healer ) const
3733{
3734 if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3735 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3736 return disinfectant_power + disinfectant_scaling * healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3737 }
3738
3739 return disinfectant_power;
3740}
3741
3742int heal_actor::finish_using( player &healer, player &patient, item &it, hp_part healed ) const
3743{
3744 float practice_amount = limb_power * 3.0f;
3745 const int dam = get_heal_value( healer, healed );
3746
3747 const bodypart_id bp = convert_bp( Character::hp_to_bp( healed ) ).id();
3748 const int cur_hp = patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp );
3749
3750 if( ( cur_hp >= 1 ) && ( dam > 0 ) ) { // Prevent first-aid from mending limbs
3751 patient.heal( bp, dam );
3752 } else if( ( cur_hp >= 1 ) && ( dam < 0 ) ) {
3753 patient.apply_damage( nullptr, bp, -dam ); //hurt takes + damage
3754 }
3755
3756 const body_part bp_healed = player::hp_to_bp( healed );
3757
3758 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3759 const bool u_see = healer.is_player() || patient.is_player() ||
3760 player_character.sees( healer ) || player_character.sees( patient );
3761 const bool player_healing_player = healer.is_player() && patient.is_player();
3762 // Need a helper here - messages are from healer's point of view
3763 // but it would be cool if NPCs could use this function too
3764 const auto heal_msg = [&]( game_message_type msg_type,
3765 const char *player_player_msg, const char *other_msg ) {
3766 if( !u_see ) {
3767 return;
3768 }
3769
3770 if( player_healing_player ) {
3771 add_msg( msg_type, player_player_msg );
3772 } else {
3773 add_msg( msg_type, other_msg );
3774 }
3775 };
3776
3777 if( patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, bp_healed ) ) {
3778 if( x_in_y( bleed, 1.0f ) ) {
3779 patient.remove_effect( effect_bleed, bp_healed );
3780 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You stop the bleeding." ), _( "The bleeding is stopped." ) );
3781 } else {
3782 heal_msg( m_warning, _( "You fail to stop the bleeding." ), _( "The wound still bleeds." ) );
3783 }
3784
3785 practice_amount += bleed * 3.0f;
3786 }
3787 if( patient.has_effect( effect_bite, bp_healed ) ) {
3788 if( x_in_y( bite, 1.0f ) ) {
3789 patient.remove_effect( effect_bite, bp_healed );
3790 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You clean the wound." ), _( "The wound is cleaned." ) );
3791 } else {
3792 heal_msg( m_warning, _( "Your wound still aches." ), _( "The wound still looks bad." ) );
3793 }
3794
3795 practice_amount += bite * 3.0f;
3796 }
3797 if( patient.has_effect( effect_infected, bp_healed ) ) {
3798 if( x_in_y( infect, 1.0f ) ) {
3799 const time_duration infected_dur = patient.get_effect_dur( effect_infected, bp_healed );
3800 patient.remove_effect( effect_infected, bp_healed );
3801 patient.add_effect( effect_recover, infected_dur );
3802 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You disinfect the wound." ), _( "The wound is disinfected." ) );
3803 } else {
3804 heal_msg( m_warning, _( "Your wound still hurts." ), _( "The wound still looks nasty." ) );
3805 }
3806
3807 practice_amount += infect * 10.0f;
3808 }
3809
3810 if( long_action ) {
3811 healer.add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish using the %s." ), it.tname() );
3812 }
3813
3814 for( const auto &eff : effects ) {
3815 patient.add_effect( eff.id, eff.duration, eff.bp );
3816 if( eff.permanent ) {
3817 patient.get_effect( eff.id, eff.bp ).set_permanent();
3818 }
3819 }
3820
3821 if( !used_up_item_id.is_empty() ) {
3822 // If the item is a tool, `make` it the new form
3823 // Otherwise it probably was consumed, so create a new one
3824 if( it.is_tool() ) {
3825 it.convert( used_up_item_id );
3826 for( const auto &flag : used_up_item_flags ) {
3827 it.set_flag( flag );
3828 }
3829 } else {
3830 item used_up( used_up_item_id, it.birthday() );
3831 used_up.charges = used_up_item_charges;
3832 for( const auto &flag : used_up_item_flags ) {
3833 used_up.set_flag( flag );
3834 }
3835 healer.i_add_or_drop( used_up, used_up_item_quantity );
3836 }
3837 }
3838
3839 // apply healing over time effects
3840 if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3841 int bandages_intensity = get_bandaged_level( healer );
3842 patient.add_effect( effect_bandaged, 1_turns, bp_healed );
3843 effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_bandaged, bp_healed );
3844 e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * bandages_intensity );
3845 patient.damage_bandaged[healed] = patient.get_part_hp_max( bp ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp );
3846 practice_amount += 2 * bandages_intensity;
3847 }
3848 if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3849 int disinfectant_intensity = get_disinfected_level( healer );
3850 patient.add_effect( effect_disinfected, 1_turns, bp_healed );
3851 effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_disinfected, bp_healed );
3852 e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * disinfectant_intensity );
3853 patient.damage_disinfected[healed] = patient.get_part_hp_max( bp ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp );
3854 practice_amount += 2 * disinfectant_intensity;
3855 }
3856 practice_amount = std::max( 9.0f, practice_amount );
3857
3858 healer.practice( skill_firstaid, static_cast<int>( practice_amount ) );
3859 return it.type->charges_to_use();
3860}
3861
3862static hp_part pick_part_to_heal(
3863 const player &healer, const player &patient,
3864 const std::string &menu_header,
3865 int limb_power, int head_bonus, int torso_bonus,
3866 float bleed_chance, float bite_chance, float infect_chance,
3867 bool force, float bandage_power, float disinfectant_power )
3868{
3869 const bool bleed = bleed_chance > 0.0f;
3870 const bool bite = bite_chance > 0.0f;
3871 const bool infect = infect_chance > 0.0f;
3872 const bool precise = &healer == &patient ?
3873 patient.has_trait( trait_SELFAWARE ) :
3874 /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases precision when using first aid on someone else */
3875
3876 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases precision when using first aid on someone else */
3877 ( healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) * 4 + healer.per_cur >= 20 );
3878 while( true ) {
3879 hp_part healed_part = patient.body_window( menu_header, force, precise,
3880 limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3881 bleed_chance, bite_chance, infect_chance, bandage_power, disinfectant_power );
3882 if( healed_part == num_hp_parts ) {
3883 return num_hp_parts;
3884 }
3885
3886 const bodypart_id &bp = convert_bp( player::hp_to_bp( healed_part ) ).id();
3887 if( ( infect && patient.has_effect( effect_infected, bp->token ) ) ||
3888 ( bite && patient.has_effect( effect_bite, bp->token ) ) ||
3889 ( bleed && patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, bp->token ) ) ) {
3890 return healed_part;
3891 }
3892
3893 if( patient.is_limb_broken( bp ) ) {
3894 if( healed_part == hp_arm_l || healed_part == hp_arm_r ) {
3895 add_msg( m_info, _( "That arm is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint." ) );
3896 } else if( healed_part == hp_leg_l || healed_part == hp_leg_r ) {
3897 add_msg( m_info, _( "That leg is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint." ) );
3898 } else {
3899 add_msg( m_info, "That body part is bugged. It needs developer's attention." );
3900 }
3901
3902 continue;
3903 }
3904
3905 if( force || patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp ) < patient.get_part_hp_max( bp ) ) {
3906 return healed_part;
3907 }
3908 }
3909}
3910
3911hp_part heal_actor::use_healing_item( player &healer, player &patient, item &it, bool force ) const
3912{
3913 bodypart_id healed = bodypart_id( "num_bp" );
3914 const int head_bonus = get_heal_value( healer, hp_head );
3915 const int limb_power = get_heal_value( healer, hp_arm_l );
3916 const int torso_bonus = get_heal_value( healer, hp_torso );
3917
3918 if( !patient.can_use_heal_item( it ) ) {
3919 patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
3920 _( "Your biology is not compatible with that item." ),
3921 _( "<npcname>'s biology is not compatible with that item." ) );
3922 return num_hp_parts; // canceled
3923 }
3924
3925 if( healer.is_npc() ) {
3926 // NPCs heal whatever has sustained the most damaged that they can heal but never
3927 // rebandage parts
3928 int highest_damage = 0;
3929 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : patient.get_body() ) {
3930 const bodypart &part = elem.second;
3931 int damage = 0;
3932 if( ( !patient.has_effect( effect_bandaged, elem.first->token ) && bandages_power > 0 ) ||
3933 ( !patient.has_effect( effect_disinfected, elem.first->token ) && disinfectant_power > 0 ) ) {
3934 damage += part.get_hp_max() - part.get_hp_cur();
3935 damage += bleed * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_bleed, elem.first->token ) / 5_minutes;
3936 damage += bite * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_bite, elem.first->token ) / 10_minutes;
3937 damage += infect * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_infected, elem.first->token ) / 10_minutes;
3938 }
3939 if( damage > highest_damage ) {
3940 highest_damage = damage;
3941 healed = elem.first.id();
3942 }
3943 }
3944 } else if( patient.is_player() ) {
3945 // Player healing self - let player select
3946 if( healer.activity.id() != ACT_FIRSTAID ) {
3947 const std::string menu_header = _( "Select a body part for: " ) + it.tname();
3948 healed = convert_bp( Character::hp_to_bp( pick_part_to_heal( healer, patient, menu_header,
3949 limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3950 bleed, bite, infect, force,
3951 get_bandaged_level( healer ),
3952 get_disinfected_level( healer ) ) ) ).id();
3953 if( healed == bodypart_id( "num_bp" ) ) {
3954 add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
3955 return num_hp_parts; // canceled
3956 }
3957 }
3958 // Brick healing if using a first aid kit for the first time.
3959 if( long_action && healer.activity.id() != ACT_FIRSTAID ) {
3960 // Cancel and wait for activity completion.
3961 return Character::bp_to_hp( healed->token );
3962 } else if( healer.activity.id() == ACT_FIRSTAID ) {
3963 // Completed activity, extract body part from it.
3964 healed = convert_bp( Character::hp_to_bp( static_cast<hp_part>
3965 ( healer.activity.values[0] ) ) ).id();
3966 }
3967 } else {
3968 // Player healing NPC
3969 // TODO: Remove this hack, allow using activities on NPCs
3970 const std::string menu_header = string_format( pgettext( "healing",
3971 //~ %1$s: patient name, %2$s: healing item name
3972 "Select a body part of %1$s for %2$s:" ),
3973 patient.disp_name(), it.tname() );
3974 healed = convert_bp( Character::hp_to_bp( pick_part_to_heal( healer, patient, menu_header,
3975 limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3976 bleed, bite, infect, force,
3977 get_bandaged_level( healer ),
3978 get_disinfected_level( healer ) ) ) ).id();
3979 }
3980
3981 if( healed != bodypart_id( "num_bp" ) ) {
3982 finish_using( healer, patient, it, Character::bp_to_hp( healed->token ) );
3983 }
3984
3985 return Character::bp_to_hp( healed->token );
3986}
3987
3988void heal_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
3989{
3990 if( head_power > 0 || torso_power > 0 || limb_power > 0 || bandages_power > 0 ||
3991 disinfectant_power > 0 || bleed > 0.0f || bite > 0.0f || infect > 0.0f ) {
3992 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "<bold>Healing effects</bold> " ) );
3993 }
3994
3995 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3996 if( head_power > 0 || torso_power > 0 || limb_power > 0 ) {
3997 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base healing: " ) );
3998 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( "Head: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline, head_power );
3999 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( " Torso: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline, torso_power );
4000 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( " Limbs: " ), limb_power );
4001 if( g != nullptr ) {
4002 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual healing: " ) );
4003 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( "Head: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
4004 get_heal_value( player_character, hp_head ) );
4005 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( " Torso: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
4006 get_heal_value( player_character, hp_torso ) );
4007 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( " Limbs: " ), get_heal_value( player_character, hp_arm_l ) );
4008 }
4009 }
4010
4011 if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
4012 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base bandaging quality: " ),
4013 texitify_base_healing_power( static_cast<int>( bandages_power ) ) );
4014 if( g != nullptr ) {
4015 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual bandaging quality: " ),
4016 texitify_healing_power( get_bandaged_level( player_character ) ) );
4017 }
4018 }
4019
4020 if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
4021 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base disinfecting quality: " ),
4022 texitify_base_healing_power( static_cast<int>( disinfectant_power ) ) );
4023 if( g != nullptr ) {
4024 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual disinfecting quality: " ),
4025 texitify_healing_power( get_disinfected_level( player_character ) ) );
4026 }
4027 }
4028
4029 if( bleed > 0.0f || bite > 0.0f || infect > 0.0f ) {
4030 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Chance to heal (percent): " ) );
4031 if( bleed > 0.0f ) {
4032 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Bleeding: " ),
4033 static_cast<int>( bleed * 100 ) );
4034 }
4035 if( bite > 0.0f ) {
4036 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Bite: " ),
4037 static_cast<int>( bite * 100 ) );
4038 }
4039 if( infect > 0.0f ) {
4040 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Infection: " ),
4041 static_cast<int>( infect * 100 ) );
4042 }
4043 }
4044
4045 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Moves to use: " ), move_cost );
4046}
4047
4048place_trap_actor::place_trap_actor( const std::string &type ) :
4049 iuse_actor( type ), needs_neighbor_terrain( ter_str_id::NULL_ID() ),
4050 outer_layer_trap( trap_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {}
4051
4052place_trap_actor::data::data() : trap( trap_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {}
4053
4054void place_trap_actor::data::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4055{
4056 assign( obj, "trap", trap );
4057 assign( obj, "done_message", done_message );
4058 assign( obj, "practice", practice );
4059 assign( obj, "moves", moves );
4060}
4061
4062void place_trap_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4063{
4064 assign( obj, "allow_underwater", allow_underwater );
4065 assign( obj, "allow_under_player", allow_under_player );
4066 assign( obj, "needs_solid_neighbor", needs_solid_neighbor );
4067 assign( obj, "needs_neighbor_terrain", needs_neighbor_terrain );
4068 assign( obj, "bury_question", bury_question );
4069 if( !bury_question.empty() ) {
4070 JsonObject buried_json = obj.get_object( "bury" );
4071 buried_data.load( buried_json );
4072 }
4073 unburied_data.load( obj );
4074 assign( obj, "outer_layer_trap", outer_layer_trap );
4075}
4076
4077std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_trap_actor::clone() const
4078{
4079 return std::make_unique<place_trap_actor>( *this );
4080}
4081
4082static bool is_solid_neighbor( const tripoint &pos, const point &offset )
4083{
4084 map &here = get_map();
4085 const tripoint a = pos + offset;
4086 const tripoint b = pos - offset;
4087 return here.move_cost( a ) != 2 && here.move_cost( b ) != 2;
4088}
4089
4090static bool has_neighbor( const tripoint &pos, const ter_id &terrain_id )
4091{
4092 map &here = get_map();
4093 for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1, 0 ) ) {
4094 if( here.ter( t ) == terrain_id ) {
4095 return true;
4096 }
4097 }
4098 return false;
4099}
4100
4101bool place_trap_actor::is_allowed( player &p, const tripoint &pos, const std::string &name ) const
4102{
4103 if( !allow_under_player && pos == p.pos() ) {
4104 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Yeah. Place the %s at your feet. Real damn smart move." ),
4105 name );
4106 return false;
4107 }
4108 map &here = get_map();
4109 if( here.move_cost( pos ) != 2 ) {
4110 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't place a %s there." ), name );
4111 return false;
4112 }
4113 if( needs_solid_neighbor ) {
4114 if( !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_east ) && !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_south ) &&
4115 !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_south_east ) && !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_north_east ) ) {
4116 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You must place the %s between two solid tiles." ), name );
4117 return false;
4118 }
4119 }
4120 if( needs_neighbor_terrain && !has_neighbor( pos, needs_neighbor_terrain ) ) {
4121 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s needs a %s adjacent to it." ), name,
4122 needs_neighbor_terrain.obj().name() );
4123 return false;
4124 }
4125 const trap &existing_trap = here.tr_at( pos );
4126 if( !existing_trap.is_null() ) {
4127 if( existing_trap.can_see( pos, p ) ) {
4128 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't place a %s there. It contains a trap already." ),
4129 name );
4130 } else {
4131 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You trigger a %s!" ), existing_trap.name() );
4132 existing_trap.trigger( pos, &p );
4133 }
4134 return false;
4135 }
4136 return true;
4137}
4138
4139static void place_and_add_as_known( player &p, const tripoint &pos, const trap_str_id &id )
4140{
4141 map &here = get_map();
4142 here.trap_set( pos, id );
4143 const trap &tr = here.tr_at( pos );
4144 if( !tr.can_see( pos, p ) ) {
4145 p.add_known_trap( pos, tr );
4146 }
4147}
4148
4149int place_trap_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4150{
4151 const bool could_bury = !bury_question.empty();
4152 if( !allow_underwater && p.is_underwater() ) {
4153 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
4154 return 0;
4155 }
4156 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4157 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while mounted." ) );
4158 return 0;
4159 }
4160 const cata::optional<tripoint> pos_ = choose_adjacent( string_format( _( "Place %s where?" ),
4161 it.tname() ) );
4162 if( !pos_ ) {
4163 return 0;
4164 }
4165 tripoint pos = *pos_;
4166
4167 if( !is_allowed( p, pos, it.tname() ) ) {
4168 return 0;
4169 }
4170
4171 map &here = get_map();
4172 int distance_to_trap_center = unburied_data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius() +
4173 outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius() + 1;
4174 if( unburied_data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius() > 0 ) {
4175 // Math correction for multi-tile traps
4176 pos.x = ( pos.x - p.posx() ) * distance_to_trap_center + p.posx();
4177 pos.y = ( pos.y - p.posy() ) * distance_to_trap_center + p.posy();
4178 for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius(),
4179 0 ) ) {
4180 if( !is_allowed( p, t, it.tname() ) ) {
4181 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4182 _( "That trap needs a space in %d tiles radius to be clear, centered %d tiles from you." ),
4183 outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius(), distance_to_trap_center );
4184 return 0;
4185 }
4186 }
4187 }
4188
4189 const bool has_shovel = p.has_quality( quality_id( "DIG" ), 3 );
4190 const bool is_diggable = here.has_flag( "DIGGABLE", pos );
4191 bool bury = false;
4192 if( could_bury && has_shovel && is_diggable ) {
4193 bury = query_yn( _( bury_question ) );
4194 }
4195 const auto &data = bury ? buried_data : unburied_data;
4196
4197 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( data.done_message ), distance_to_trap_center );
4198 p.practice( skill_id( "traps" ), data.practice );
4199 p.mod_moves( -data.moves );
4200
4201 place_and_add_as_known( p, pos, data.trap );
4202 for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius(), 0 ) ) {
4203 if( t != pos ) {
4204 place_and_add_as_known( p, t, outer_layer_trap );
4205 }
4206 }
4207 return 1;
4208}
4209
4210void emit_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4211{
4212 assign( obj, "emits", emits );
4213 assign( obj, "scale_qty", scale_qty );
4214}
4215
4216int emit_actor::use( player &, item &it, bool, const tripoint &pos ) const
4217{
4218 map &here = get_map();
4219 const float scaling = scale_qty ? it.charges : 1;
4220 for( const auto &e : emits ) {
4221 here.emit_field( pos, e, scaling );
4222 }
4223
4224 return 1;
4225}
4226
4227std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> emit_actor::clone() const
4228{
4229 return std::make_unique<emit_actor>( *this );
4230}
4231
4232void emit_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4233{
4234 /*
4235 // TODO: This must be called after all finalization
4236 for( const auto& e : emits ) {
4237 if( !e.is_valid() ) {
4238 debugmsg( "Item %s has unknown emit source %s", my_item_type.c_str(), e.c_str() );
4239 }
4240 }
4241 */
4242
4243 if( scale_qty && !item::count_by_charges( my_item_type ) ) {
4244 debugmsg( "Item %s has emit_actor with scale_qty, but is not counted by charges",
4245 my_item_type.c_str() );
4246 scale_qty = false;
4247 }
4248}
4249
4250void saw_barrel_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4251{
4252 assign( jo, "cost", cost );
4253}
4254
4255int saw_barrel_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
4256{
4257 if( t ) {
4258 return 0;
4259 }
4260
4261 auto loc = game_menus::inv::saw_barrel( p, it );
4262
4263 if( !loc ) {
4264 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4265 return 0;
4266 }
4267
4268 item &obj = *loc.obtain( p );
4269 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You saw down the barrel of your %s." ), obj.tname() );
4270 obj.put_in( item( "barrel_small", calendar::turn ) );
4271
4272 return 0;
4273}
4274
4275ret_val<bool> saw_barrel_actor::can_use_on( const player &, const item &, const item &target ) const
4276{
4277 if( !target.is_gun() ) {
4278 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "It's not a gun." ) );
4279 }
4280
4281 if( target.type->gun->barrel_length <= 0_ml ) {
4282 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "The barrel is too short." ) );
4283 }
4284
4285 if( target.gunmod_find( itype_barrel_small ) ) {
4286 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "The barrel is already sawn-off." ) );
4287 }
4288
4289 const auto gunmods = target.gunmods();
4290 const bool modified_barrel = std::any_of( gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(),
4291 []( const item * mod ) {
4292 return mod->type->gunmod->location == gunmod_location( "barrel" );
4293 } );
4294
4295 if( modified_barrel ) {
4296 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Can't saw off modified barrels." ) );
4297 }
4298
4299 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
4300}
4301
4302std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> saw_barrel_actor::clone() const
4303{
4304 return std::make_unique<saw_barrel_actor>( *this );
4305}
4306
4307int install_bionic_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4308{
4309 if( p.can_install_bionics( *it.type, p, false ) ) {
4310 return p.install_bionics( *it.type, p, false ) ? it.type->charges_to_use() : 0;
4311 } else {
4312 return 0;
4313 }
4314}
4315
4316ret_val<bool> install_bionic_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
4317 const tripoint & ) const
4318{
4319 if( !it.is_bionic() ) {
4320 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure();
4321 }
4322 const bionic_id &bid = it.type->bionic->id;
4323 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4324 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't install bionics while mounted." ) );
4325 }
4326 if( !get_option<bool>( "MANUAL_BIONIC_INSTALLATION" ) &&
4327 !p.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ) {
4328 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't self-install bionics." ) );
4329 } else if( !p.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ) {
4330 if( it.has_fault( fault_bionic_nonsterile ) ) {
4331 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "This CBM is not sterile, you can't install it." ) );
4332 } else if( units::energy_max - p.get_max_power_level() < bid->capacity ) {
4333 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Max power capacity already reached" ) );
4334 }
4335 }
4336
4337 if( p.has_bionic( bid ) ) {
4338 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You have already installed this bionic." ) );
4339 } else if( bid->upgraded_bionic && !p.has_bionic( bid->upgraded_bionic ) ) {
4340 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "There is nothing to upgrade." ) );
4341 } else {
4342 const bool downgrade = std::any_of( bid->available_upgrades.begin(), bid->available_upgrades.end(),
4343 std::bind( &player::has_bionic, &p, std::placeholders::_1 ) );
4344
4345 if( downgrade ) {
4346 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You have a superior version installed." ) );
4347 }
4348 }
4349
4350 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
4351}
4352
4353std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> install_bionic_actor::clone() const
4354{
4355 return std::make_unique<install_bionic_actor>( *this );
4356}
4357
4358void install_bionic_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4359{
4360 if( !my_item_type->bionic ) {
4361 debugmsg( "Item %s has install_bionic actor, but it's not a bionic.", my_item_type.c_str() );
4362 }
4363}
4364
4365int detach_gunmods_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4366{
4367 auto mods = it.gunmods();
4368
4369 mods.erase( std::remove_if( mods.begin(), mods.end(), std::bind( &item::is_irremovable,
4370 std::placeholders::_1 ) ), mods.end() );
4371
4372 uilist prompt;
4373 prompt.text = _( "Remove which modification?" );
4374
4375 for( size_t i = 0; i != mods.size(); ++i ) {
4376 prompt.addentry( i, true, -1, mods[ i ]->tname() );
4377 }
4378
4379 prompt.query();
4380
4381 if( prompt.ret >= 0 ) {
4382 item *gm = mods[ prompt.ret ];
4383 p.gunmod_remove( it, *gm );
4384 } else {
4385 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4386 }
4387
4388 return 0;
4389}
4390
4391ret_val<bool> detach_gunmods_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
4392 const tripoint & ) const
4393{
4394 const auto mods = it.gunmods();
4395
4396 if( mods.empty() ) {
4397 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Doesn't appear to be modded." ) );
4398 }
4399
4400 const bool no_removables = std::all_of( mods.begin(), mods.end(), std::bind( &item::is_irremovable,
4401 std::placeholders::_1 ) );
4402
4403 if( no_removables ) {
4404 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "None of the mods can be removed." ) );
4405 }
4406
4407 if( p.is_worn(
4408 it ) ) { // Prevent removal of shoulder straps and thereby making the gun un-wearable again.
4409 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Has to be taken off first." ) );
4410 }
4411
4412 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
4413}
4414
4415std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> detach_gunmods_actor::detach_gunmods_actor::clone() const
4416{
4417 return std::make_unique<detach_gunmods_actor>( *this );
4418}
4419
4420void detach_gunmods_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4421{
4422 if( !my_item_type->gun ) {
4423 debugmsg( "Item %s has detach_gunmods_actor actor, but it's a gun.", my_item_type.c_str() );
4424 }
4425}
4426
4427std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> mutagen_actor::clone() const
4428{
4429 return std::make_unique<mutagen_actor>( *this );
4430}
4431
4432void mutagen_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4433{
4434 mutation_category = obj.get_string( "mutation_category", "ANY" );
4435 is_weak = obj.get_bool( "is_weak", false );
4436 is_strong = obj.get_bool( "is_strong", false );
4437}
4438
4439int mutagen_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4440{
4441 mutagen_attempt checks =
4442 mutagen_common_checks( p, it, false, mutagen_technique::consumed_mutagen );
4443
4444 if( !checks.allowed ) {
4445 return checks.charges_used;
4446 }
4447
4448 bool no_category = mutation_category == "ANY";
4449 bool balanced = get_option<bool>( "BALANCED_MUTATIONS" );
4450 int accumulated_mutagen = p.get_effect_int( effect_accumulated_mutagen );
4451 if( balanced && !is_strong && is_weak && accumulated_mutagen < 2 && no_category && !p.query_yn(
4452 _( "Looking at it just makes you tired. It probably won't work. Do you want to try anyway?" )
4453 ) ) {
4454 return 0;
4455 }
4456 if( is_weak && !one_in( 3 ) && !balanced ) {
4457 // Nothing! Mutagenic flesh often just fails to work.
4458 return it.type->charges_to_use();
4459 }
4460
4461 if( balanced && no_category ) {
4462 for( int i = ( is_strong ? 1 : 0 ) + ( is_weak ? 0 : 1 ); i > 0; i-- ) {
4463 p.add_effect( effect_accumulated_mutagen, 2_days, num_bp );
4464 }
4465 }
4466 const mutation_category_trait &m_category = mutation_category_trait::get_category(
4467 mutation_category );
4468
4469 if( p.has_trait( trait_MUT_JUNKIE ) ) {
4470 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You quiver with anticipation" ) );
4471 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTAGEN, 5, 50 );
4472 }
4473
4474 p.add_msg_if_player( m_category.mutagen_message() );
4475
4476 if( one_in( 6 ) ) {
4477 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
4478 _( "You suddenly feel dizzy, and collapse to the ground." ),
4479 _( "<npcname> suddenly collapses to the ground!" ) );
4480 p.add_effect( effect_downed, 20_turns, num_bp, 0 );
4481 }
4482
4483 int mut_count = 1 + ( is_strong ? one_in( 3 ) : 0 );
4484
4485 for( int i = 0; i < mut_count; i++ ) {
4486 p.mutate_category( m_category.id );
4487 p.mod_pain( m_category.mutagen_pain * rng( 1, 5 ) );
4488 }
4489 // burn calories directly
4490 p.mod_stored_nutr( m_category.mutagen_hunger * mut_count );
4491 p.mod_thirst( m_category.mutagen_thirst * mut_count );
4492 p.mod_fatigue( m_category.mutagen_fatigue * mut_count );
4493
4494 return it.type->charges_to_use();
4495}
4496
4497std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> mutagen_iv_actor::clone() const
4498{
4499 return std::make_unique<mutagen_iv_actor>( *this );
4500}
4501
4502void mutagen_iv_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4503{
4504 mutation_category = obj.get_string( "mutation_category", "ANY" );
4505}
4506
4507int mutagen_iv_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4508{
4509 mutagen_attempt checks =
4510 mutagen_common_checks( p, it, false, mutagen_technique::injected_mutagen );
4511
4512 if( !checks.allowed ) {
4513 return checks.charges_used;
4514 }
4515
4516 const mutation_category_trait &m_category = mutation_category_trait::get_category(
4517 mutation_category );
4518
4519 if( p.has_trait( trait_MUT_JUNKIE ) ) {
4520 p.add_msg_if_player( m_category.junkie_message() );
4521 } else {
4522 p.add_msg_if_player( m_category.iv_message() );
4523 }
4524
4525 // try to cross the threshold to be able to get post-threshold mutations this iv.
4526 test_crossing_threshold( p, m_category );
4527
4528 // TODO: Remove the "is_player" part, implement NPC screams
4529 if( p.is_player() && !( p.has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) ) && m_category.iv_sound ) {
4530 p.mod_pain( m_category.iv_pain );
4531 /** @EFFECT_STR increases volume of painful shouting when using IV mutagen */
4532 sounds::sound( p.pos(), m_category.iv_noise + p.str_cur, sounds::sound_t::alert,
4533 m_category.iv_sound_message(), true, m_category.iv_sound_id(), m_category.iv_sound_variant() );
4534 }
4535
4536 int mut_count = m_category.iv_min_mutations;
4537 for( int i = 0; i < m_category.iv_additional_mutations; ++i ) {
4538 if( !one_in( m_category.iv_additional_mutations_chance ) ) {
4539 ++mut_count;
4540 }
4541 }
4542
4543 for( int i = 0; i < mut_count; i++ ) {
4544 p.mutate_category( m_category.id );
4545 p.mod_pain( m_category.iv_pain * rng( 1, 5 ) );
4546 }
4547
4548 p.mod_stored_kcal( -10 * m_category.iv_hunger * mut_count );
4549 p.mod_thirst( m_category.iv_thirst * mut_count );
4550 p.mod_fatigue( m_category.iv_fatigue * mut_count );
4551
4552 if( m_category.id == "CHIMERA" ) {
4553 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTAGEN_CHIMERA, m_category.iv_morale, m_category.iv_morale_max );
4554 } else if( m_category.id == "ELFA" ) {
4555 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTAGEN_ELF, m_category.iv_morale, m_category.iv_morale_max );
4556 } else if( m_category.iv_morale > 0 ) {
4557 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTAGEN_MUTATION, m_category.iv_morale, m_category.iv_morale_max );
4558 }
4559
4560 if( m_category.iv_sleep && !one_in( 3 ) ) {
4561 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, m_category.iv_sleep_message() );
4562 /** @EFFECT_INT reduces sleep duration when using IV mutagen */
4563 p.fall_asleep( time_duration::from_turns( m_category.iv_sleep_dur - p.int_cur * 5 ) );
4564 }
4565
4566 // try crossing again after getting new in-category mutations.
4567 test_crossing_threshold( p, m_category );
4568
4569 return it.type->charges_to_use();
4570}
4571
4572std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_tent_actor::clone() const
4573{
4574 return std::make_unique<deploy_tent_actor>( *this );
4575}
4576
4577void deploy_tent_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4578{
4579 assign( obj, "radius", radius );
4580 assign( obj, "wall", wall );
4581 assign( obj, "floor", floor );
4582 assign( obj, "floor_center", floor_center );
4583 assign( obj, "door_opened", door_opened );
4584 assign( obj, "door_closed", door_closed );
4585 assign( obj, "broken_type", broken_type );
4586}
4587
4588int deploy_tent_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4589{
4590 int diam = 2 * radius + 1;
4591 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4592 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
4593 return 0;
4594 }
4595 const cata::optional<tripoint> dir = choose_direction( string_format(
4596 _( "Put up the %s where (%dx%d clear area)?" ), it.tname(), diam, diam ) );
4597 if( !dir ) {
4598 return 0;
4599 }
4600 const tripoint direction = *dir;
4601
4602 map &here = get_map();
4603 // We place the center of the structure (radius + 1)
4604 // spaces away from the player.
4605 // First check there's enough room.
4606 const tripoint center = p.pos() + tripoint( ( radius + 1 ) * direction.x,
4607 ( radius + 1 ) * direction.y, 0 );
4608 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
4609 if( const auto vp = here.veh_at( dest ) ) {
4610 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is in the way." ), vp->vehicle().name );
4611 return 0;
4612 }
4613 if( const Creature *const c = g->critter_at( dest ) ) {
4614 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is in the way." ), c->disp_name() );
4615 return 0;
4616 }
4617 if( here.impassable( dest ) || !here.has_flag( "FLAT", dest ) ) {
4618 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s in that direction isn't suitable for placing the %s." ),
4619 here.name( dest ), it.tname() );
4620 return 0;
4621 }
4622 if( here.has_furn( dest ) ) {
4623 add_msg( m_info, _( "There is already furniture (%s) there." ), here.furnname( dest ) );
4624 return 0;
4625 }
4626 }
4627 // Make a square of floor surrounded by wall.
4628 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
4629 here.furn_set( dest, wall );
4630 }
4631 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius - 1 ) ) {
4632 here.furn_set( dest, floor );
4633 }
4634 // Place the center floor and the door.
4635 if( floor_center ) {
4636 here.furn_set( center, *floor_center );
4637 }
4638 here.furn_set( p.pos() + direction, door_closed );
4639 add_msg( m_info, _( "You set up the %s on the ground." ), it.tname() );
4640 add_msg( m_info, _( "Examine the center square to pack it up again." ) );
4641 return 1;
4642}
4643
4644bool deploy_tent_actor::check_intact( const tripoint &center ) const
4645{
4646 map &here = get_map();
4647 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
4648 const furn_id fid = here.furn( dest );
4649 if( dest == center && floor_center ) {
4650 if( fid != *floor_center ) {
4651 return false;
4652 }
4653 } else if( square_dist( dest, center ) < radius ) {
4654 // So we are inside the tent
4655 if( fid != floor ) {
4656 return false;
4657 }
4658 } else {
4659 // We are on the border of the tent
4660 if( fid != wall && fid != door_opened && fid != door_closed ) {
4661 return false;
4662 }
4663 }
4664 }
4665 return true;
4666}
4667
4668void weigh_self_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
4669{
4670 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4671 _( "Use this item to weigh yourself. Includes everything you are wearing." ) );
4672}
4673
4674int weigh_self_actor::use( player &p, item &, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4675{
4676 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4677 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot weigh yourself while mounted." ) );
4678 return 0;
4679 }
4680 // this is a weight, either in kgs or in lbs.
4681 double weight = convert_weight( p.get_weight() );
4682 if( weight > convert_weight( max_weight ) ) {
4683 popup( _( "ERROR: Max weight of %.0f %s exceeded" ), convert_weight( max_weight ), weight_units() );
4684 } else {
4685 popup( "%.0f %s", weight, weight_units() );
4686 }
4687 return 0;
4688}
4689
4690void weigh_self_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4691{
4692 assign( jo, "max_weight", max_weight );
4693}
4694
4695std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> weigh_self_actor::clone() const
4696{
4697 return std::make_unique<weigh_self_actor>( *this );
4698}
4699
4700void sew_advanced_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4701{
4702 // Mandatory:
4703 for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "materials" ) ) {
4704 materials.emplace( line );
4705 }
4706 for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "clothing_mods" ) ) {
4707 clothing_mods.push_back( clothing_mod_id( line ) );
4708 }
4709
4710 // TODO: Make skill non-mandatory while still erroring on invalid skill
4711 const std::string skill_string = obj.get_string( "skill" );
4712 used_skill = skill_id( skill_string );
4713 if( !used_skill.is_valid() ) {
4714 obj.throw_error( "Invalid skill", "skill" );
4715 }
4716}
4717
4718int sew_advanced_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4719{
4720 if( p.is_npc() ) {
4721 return 0;
4722 }
4723 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4724 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
4725 return 0;
4726 }
4727 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
4728 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
4729 return 0;
4730 }
4731
4732 if( !character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( p ) ) {
4733 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't see to sew!" ) );
4734 return 0;
4735 }
4736
4737 auto filter = [this]( const item & itm ) {
4738 return itm.is_armor() && !itm.is_firearm() && !itm.is_power_armor() &&
4739 itm.made_of_any( materials );
4740 };
4741 // note: if !p.is_npc() then p is avatar.
4742 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu(
4743 filter, *p.as_avatar(), _( "Enhance which clothing?" ) );
4744 if( !loc ) {
4745 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" ) );
4746 return 0;
4747 }
4748 item &mod = *loc;
4749 if( &mod == &it ) {
4750 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4751 _( "This can be used to repair or modify other items, not itself." ) );
4752 return 0;
4753 }
4754
4755 // Gives us an item with the mod added or removed (toggled)
4756 const auto modded_copy = []( const item & proto, const std::string & mod_type ) {
4757 item mcopy = proto;
4758 if( mcopy.has_own_flag( mod_type ) == 0 ) {
4759 mcopy.set_flag( mod_type );
4760 } else {
4761 mcopy.unset_flag( mod_type );
4762 }
4763
4764 return mcopy;
4765 };
4766
4767 // Cache available materials
4768 std::map< itype_id, bool > has_enough;
4769 const int items_needed = mod.volume() / 750_ml + 1;
4770 const inventory &crafting_inv = p.crafting_inventory();
4771 // Go through all discovered repair items and see if we have any of them available
4772 for( auto &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
4773 has_enough[cm.item_string] = crafting_inv.has_amount( cm.item_string, items_needed );
4774 }
4775
4776 int mod_count = 0;
4777 for( auto &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
4778 mod_count += mod.has_own_flag( cm.flag );
4779 }
4780
4781 // We need extra thread to lose it on bad rolls
4782 const int thread_needed = mod.volume() / 125_ml + 10;
4783
4784 std::vector<std::string> valid_mods;
4785 if( mod.find_armor_data() ) {
4786 valid_mods = mod.find_armor_data()->valid_mods;
4787 }
4788
4789 const auto get_compare_color = [&]( const int before, const int after,
4790 const bool higher_is_better ) {
4791 return before == after ? c_unset : ( ( after > before ) == higher_is_better ? c_light_green :
4792 c_red );
4793 };
4794 const auto get_volume_compare_color = [&]( const units::volume & before,
4795 const units::volume & after,
