4796 const bool higher_is_better ) {
4797 return before == after ? c_unset : ( ( after > before ) == higher_is_better ? c_light_green :
4798 c_red );
4799 };
4800 const auto format_desc_string = [&]( const std::string & label, const int before, const int after,
4801 const bool higher_is_better ) {
4802 return colorize( string_format( "%s: %d->%d\n", label, before, after ), get_compare_color( before,
4803 after, higher_is_better ) );
4804 };
4805
4806 uilist tmenu;
4807 tmenu.text = _( "How do you want to modify it?" );
4808
4809 int index = 0;
4810 for( auto cm : clothing_mods ) {
4811 auto obj = cm.obj();
4812 item temp_item = modded_copy( mod, obj.flag );
4813 temp_item.update_clothing_mod_val();
4814
4815 bool enab = false;
4816 std::string prompt;
4817 if( mod.has_own_flag( obj.flag ) == 0 ) {
4818 // TODO: Fix for UTF-8 strings
4819 // TODO: find other places where this is used and make a global function for all
4820 static const auto tolower = []( std::string t ) {
4821 if( !t.empty() ) {
4822 t.front() = std::tolower( t.front() );
4823 }
4824 return t;
4825 };
4826 // Mod not already present, check if modification is possible
4827 if( obj.restricted &&
4828 std::find( valid_mods.begin(), valid_mods.end(), obj.flag ) == valid_mods.end() ) {
4829 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$s: mod name
4830 prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (incompatible with %2$s)" ), tolower( obj.implement_prompt ),
4831 mod.tname( 1, false ) );
4832 } else if( it.charges < thread_needed ) {
4833 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of thread needed
4834 prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d thread loaded)" ),
4835 tolower( obj.implement_prompt ), thread_needed );
4836 } else if( !has_enough[obj.item_string] ) {
4837 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of items needed, %3$s: items needed
4838 prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d %3$s)" ), tolower( obj.implement_prompt ),
4839 items_needed, item::nname( obj.item_string, items_needed ) );
4840 } else {
4841 // Modification is possible
4842 enab = true;
4843 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of items needed, %3$s: items needed, %4$s: number of thread needed
4844 prompt = string_format( _( "%1$s (%2$d %3$s and %4$d thread)" ), tolower( obj.implement_prompt ),
4845 items_needed, item::nname( obj.item_string, items_needed ), thread_needed );
4846 }
4847
4848 } else {
4849 // Mod already present, give option to destroy
4850 enab = true;
4851 prompt = _( obj.destroy_prompt );
4852 }
4853 std::string desc;
4854 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Bash" ), mod.bash_resist(), temp_item.bash_resist(), true );
4855 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Cut" ), mod.cut_resist(), temp_item.cut_resist(), true );
4856 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Ballistic" ), mod.bullet_resist(), temp_item.bullet_resist(),
4857 true );
4858 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Acid" ), mod.acid_resist(), temp_item.acid_resist(), true );
4859 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Fire" ), mod.fire_resist(), temp_item.fire_resist(), true );
4860 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Warmth" ), mod.get_warmth(), temp_item.get_warmth(), true );
4861 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Encumbrance" ), mod.get_encumber( p ), temp_item.get_encumber( p ),
4862 false );
4863 auto before = mod.get_storage();
4864 auto after = temp_item.get_storage();
4865 desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %s %s->%s %s\n", _( "Storage" ),
4866 format_volume( before ), volume_units_abbr(), format_volume( after ),
4867 volume_units_abbr() ), get_volume_compare_color( before, after, true ) );
4868
4869 tmenu.addentry_desc( index++, enab, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, prompt, desc );
4870 }
4871 tmenu.textwidth = 80;
4872 tmenu.desc_enabled = true;
4873 tmenu.query();
4874 const int choice = tmenu.ret;
4875
4876 if( choice < 0 || choice >= static_cast<int>( clothing_mods.size() ) ) {
4877 return 0;
4878 }
4879
4880 // The mod player picked
4881 const std::string &the_mod = clothing_mods[choice].obj().flag;
4882
4883 // If the picked mod already exists, player wants to destroy it
4884 if( mod.has_own_flag( the_mod ) ) {
4885 if( query_yn( _( "Are you sure? You will not gain any materials back." ) ) ) {
4886 mod.unset_flag( the_mod );
4887 }
4888 mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
4889
4890 return 0;
4891 }
4892
4893 // Get the id of the material used
4894 const auto &repair_item = clothing_mods[choice].obj().item_string;
4895
4896 std::vector<item_comp> comps;
4897 comps.push_back( item_comp( repair_item, items_needed ) );
4898 // TODO: this may take up to 2 minutes, and so should start an activity instead
4899 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 30_seconds * character_funcs::fine_detail_vision_mod( p ) );
4900 p.practice( used_skill, items_needed * 3 + 3 );
4901 /** @EFFECT_TAILOR randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
4902 int rn = dice( 3, 2 + p.get_skill_level( used_skill ) ); // Skill
4903 /** @EFFECT_DEX randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
4904 rn += rng( 0, p.dex_cur / 2 ); // Dexterity
4905 /** @EFFECT_PER randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
4906 rn += rng( 0, p.per_cur / 2 ); // Perception
4907 rn -= mod_count * 10; // Other mods
4908
4909 if( rn <= 8 ) {
4910 const std::string startdurability = mod.durability_indicator( true );
4911 const auto destroyed = mod.inc_damage();
4912 const std::string resultdurability = mod.durability_indicator( true );
4913 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You damage your %s trying to modify it! ( %s-> %s)" ),
4914 mod.tname( 1, false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
4915 if( destroyed ) {
4916 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You destroy it!" ) );
4917 p.i_rem_keep_contents( p.get_item_position( &mod ) );
4918 }
4919 return thread_needed / 2;
4920 } else if( rn <= 10 ) {
4921 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
4922 _( "You fail to modify the clothing, and you waste thread and materials." ) );
4923 p.consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
4924 return thread_needed;
4925 } else if( rn <= 14 ) {
4926 p.add_msg_if_player( m_mixed, _( "You modify your %s, but waste a lot of thread." ),
4927 mod.tname() );
4928 p.consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
4929 mod.set_flag( the_mod );
4930 mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
4931 return thread_needed;
4932 }
4933
4934 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You modify your %s!" ), mod.tname() );
4935 mod.set_flag( the_mod );
4936 mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
4937 p.consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
4938 return thread_needed / 2;
4939}
4940
4941std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> sew_advanced_actor::clone() const
4942{
4943 return std::make_unique<sew_advanced_actor>( *this );
4944}
4945
4946void change_scent_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4947{
4948 scenttypeid = scenttype_id( obj.get_string( "scent_typeid" ) );
4949 if( !scenttypeid.is_valid() ) {
4950 obj.throw_error( "Invalid scent type id.", "scent_typeid" );
4951 }
4952 if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
4953 for( JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
4954 effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
4955 }
4956 }
4957 assign( obj, "moves", moves );
4958 assign( obj, "charges_to_use", charges_to_use );
4959 assign( obj, "scent_mod", scent_mod );
4960 assign( obj, "duration", duration );
4961 assign( obj, "waterproof", waterproof );
4962}
4963
4964int change_scent_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4965{
4966 p.set_value( "prev_scent", p.get_type_of_scent().c_str() );
4967 if( waterproof ) {
4968 p.set_value( "waterproof_scent", "true" );
4969 }
4970 p.add_effect( efftype_id( "masked_scent" ), duration, num_bp, scent_mod );
4971 p.set_type_of_scent( scenttypeid );
4972 p.mod_moves( -moves );
4973 add_msg( m_info, _( "You use the %s to mask your scent" ), it.tname() );
4974
4975 // Apply the various effects.
4976 for( const auto &eff : effects ) {
4977 p.add_effect( eff.id, eff.duration, eff.bp );
4978 if( eff.permanent ) {
4979 p.get_effect( eff.id, eff.bp ).set_permanent();
4980 }
4981 }
4982 return charges_to_use;
4983}
4984
4985std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> change_scent_iuse::clone() const
4986{
4987 return std::make_unique<change_scent_iuse>( *this );
4988}

Creature::add_effect

Creature::body
